answer_c: Ebimera bwe biba tebifukirirwa, obutaffaali munda bweyongera okuba n’omunnyo okusinga obutaffaali obwebungulula, amazzi ne gava ebweru okudda munda, ekintu ekireetera akatimba k’omu munda okukula n’oluusi olubambala olw’obutaffaali okwawukana ku kisenge ky’obutaffaali, ekintu ekireetera ebikoola okulabika ng’ebiwotose.
answer_d: Ebimera bwe biba tebifukirirwa, ebintu ebiri ebweru w'obutaffaali bifuuka bya mugattiko munene, ekireetera amazzi okuva mu munda y'obutaffaali okudda ebweru, ne kifuula obungi bw'ekitundu ky'obutaffaali ekiri wakati okukendeera era ne kireetera akatundu k'obutaffaali akakulu okukendeeza obunene, ekireetera akabina k'obutaffaali okwekutula ku kisenge ky'obutaffaali, ekireetera amakoola okulabika ng'agootedde.

question: Mu kitundu ekikwata ku butonde obutono n’ebiziyiza omubiri gw’omuntu mu kibiina eky’omusanvu, omusomesa agenda kwogera ku kiruubirirwa kino n’abayizi: “Okunnyonnyola enkola y’okugemebwa ekolebwa eddagala erigema.” Mulamwa ki abayizi gwe balina okutegeera okusobola okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa ekyo?
answer_a: Okujjukira kw'obuzibu bw'omubiri
answer_b: Ebimu ku biranga by'obwewomi obw'omuzaaliranwa:
answer_c: Ebimu ku biranga bya T lymphocytes
answer_d: Enkola macrophages gye zikoleramu emirimu gyazo

question: Mu kibiina eky’omunaana, mu somo ly’ebizimbamubiri, omusomesa alimu okusomesa ku buzimbe bw’akaziba. Okukakasa oba abayizi bategeera enjawulo wakati w’omuwendo gw’akaziba n’omuwendo gw’obuzito, abasaba okulaga omuwendo gwa purotoni, elekitulooni, ne nnyutulooni mu aluminiyamu ataliimu kyagi, nga balowooza nti omuwendo gw’obuzito bwayo guli 27 n’omuwendo gw’akaziba guli 13. Abayizi bangi balaga bino wammanga: Aluminiyamu erina elekitulooni 27, purotoni 13, ne nnyutulooni 14. Buzibu ki abayizi bwe balaga mu nkola yaabwe ey’okuyiga ku bikwata ku ebyo ebiri mu somo?
answer_a: Okukkiriza nti omuwendo gw’obusannyalaza bugendana n’omugatte gwa puletoni ne nnyutroni
answer_b: Nga tebategedde nti namba y'akaziba etambulira wamu n'omuwendo gw'amasannyalaze ag'ekika kya pozitiivu
answer_c: Okukkiriza nti namba y'obuzito etegereza omuwendo gwa chaji ennungi n'embi
answer_d: Nga tetumanyi nti namba y'obuzito etambulira wamu n'omugatte gw'obuntu obuli mu busibe

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omusanvu ataddewo ekigendererwa kino eri ekibiina kye: “Okunnyonnyola enneyisa y’ebinyonyi mu bukwatane n’etteeka lya Boyle.” Bintu ki abayizi bye balina okuba nga bamaze okubimanya okusobola okutegeera ebyo bye bagenda okuyiga?
answer_a: Ebintu ebikulu ebikwata ku matter
answer_b: Amasoboza ag’ekinyetikya aga ggaasi
answer_c: Omulamwa gw'obusirikale bw'ebintu
answer_d: Omulamwa gwa kinetic-molecular ogw’ebigaz

question: Ku nkomerero y’omutwe gw’amateeka ga Boyle mu kibiina eky’omusanvu, omusomesa yeetaaga okukebera akabonero kano akalaga okuyiga: "Okutegeera omukwano oguteereddwawo wakati w’ebintu ebikyuka mu mateeka ga Boyle". Kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukozesa okukungaanya obukakafu obulaga nti akabonero kano akalaga okuyiga kituukiddwako?
answer_a: Buuza abayizi okunnyonnyola engeri ekintu ekifumbiramu emmere mu bwangu (pressure cooker) gye kikolamu.
answer_b: Buuza abayizi okunnyonnyola engeri ekyombo ekibuuka waggulu nga kyesigamye ku bwoki bw'omukka gye kikolamu.
answer_c: Balirira omuzingo ogwa ggaasi ogwaakamalirizo oguli mu kintu ekigigattira ku buwanvu obwenjawulo.
answer_d: Buuza abayizi okunnyonnyola enkyukakyuka mu buziba bw’ekibuubulu kyefuna nga kulinnya okuva wansi w’ekidiba ky’amazzi

question: Omusomesa w’omu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya ayigiriza abayizi ku mbeera y’ebitundu by’obusimu mu kutambuza amaanyi g’obubaka. Bw’ayogera nti amaanyi g’obubaka gatambula mangu mu busimu obunene, omu ku bayizi agamba nti tasobola kutegeera nsonga ze. Omusomesa asalawo okukozesa engeri endala ey’okunnyonnyola. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki ey’okunnyonnyola eyinza okusobozesa omusomesa okulaga obutuufu lwaki obusimu obunene butambuza amaanyi g’obubaka mangu?
answer_a: Leeeta tebbule eraga emisinde gy'amasannyalaze gye gayitamu mu axon z'obubonero bw'obusimu bw'ensolo ez'omumwa nga gulimu obukulu obwenjawulo, basobole okugeraageranya enjawulo mu misinde gy'amasannyalaze gye gayitamu.
answer_b: Leeta katuni akalaga nti bw’ogatta amazzi agenkana mu miyumo ebiri egy’obuwanvu bwe gumu naye nga emu mpanga ate endala ntono, amazzi ganaatuuka ku nkomerero y’omuyumo omunene mu bwangu okusinga omuyumo omutono.
answer_c: Ssaawa ebipimo by'obunene bw'obuwuzi bw'obusimu (axons) ezitali zifaanagana, eziriko n'ezitaliko mayeliini, ng'olaga ebifo we kkubo ly'amasannyalaze we liba ligenda, wamu n'enzizi ezirimu ayoni (ion channels) n'engeri omusannyalaze gye gusaasaana nga tegunnatuuka, mu kiseera we gutuukira, ne bwe gumaze okutuuka.
answer_d: Ng’ekkubo ly’amasannyalaze, olubaawo olwa pulasitiki olubikka ku waya z’amasannyalaze lukola nga miyelini ku akisoni z’obusimu, ekongera ku bwangu bw’okusaasaanya amawulire.

question: Omusomesa yeetaaga okukolera ku kiruubirirwa kino wamu n'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'okubiri mu siniya: “Okukola okunnyonnyola okwa ssaayansi, okwesigamiziddwa ku bujulizi, okukwata ku nkola z'obusika bw'ebiramu mu nsolo”. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okubasobozesa okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Okusinziira ku mikwano gy’amaka agalina obulemu obw’enjawulo, abayizi bagigeraageranya ne banoonyereza ku nsonga lwaki buli kamu kalukusizzaawo.
answer_b: Okusinziira ku bisigalira by'ebizadde eby'endwadde ezitali za kikaba, abayizi babyetegereza ne balondoola engeri buli emu gy'esikizibwamu.
answer_c: Abayizi bakola eggereesa eririmu ebintu eby'obusika bw'ensolo era bageraageranya engeri buli kintu kyolekebwamu.
answer_d: Abayizi bakola omuti gw’olulyo nga gulaga ebika by’omusaayi eby’abayizi bannaabwe n’ab’emiryango gyabwe era ne bawa obunnyonnyofu ku ngeri gye busikibwaamu.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’ekkumi n’ebiri asabye abayizi okukwataganya obucaafu bw’obutonde bw’ensi n’enkuba ey’asidi. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano, gwe gumu ku gyo gwe balina okukolera okukwatagana n’okunoonyereza okwa ssaayansi?
answer_a: Kola okunoonyereza okukwata ku bitabo ebikwata ku mukwano oguli wakati w’enkuba erimu asidi n’obucaafu bw’obutonde bw’ensi.
answer_b:
Lubaale ki olukolagana wakati w’enkuba y’asidi n’obucaafu bw’obutonde bw’ensi, era ng’olina okuddamu ekibuuzo kino ng’oyita mu kugezesa?

Eky’okuddamu: Okukola okwegezesa okulaga engeri enkuba y’asidi gy’eyonoonaamu obutonde bw’ensi, osobola okukozesa ebimera bibiri ebifanana. Kimu ofukirire amazzi agalina asidi (enkuba y’asidi), ate ekirala ofukirire amazzi agalina obuyonjo. Weekkaanye engeri ebimera byombi gye bikulamu okumala ebbanga lye nnaku oba wiiki. Ebiwandiiko byo birina okulaga engeri enkuba y’asidi gy’ekosaamu obulamu bw’ebimera, nga kivaako okukula okutali kulungi oba okufa. Kino kiraga engeri enkuba y’asidi gy’ecaafuzaamu obutonde bw’ensi.
answer_c: Kola omulimu gw'ekikube mu labolatoli ogulaga engeri obucaafu bw'obutonde bw'ensi gye bukwaatagana n'enkuba ey'asidi.
answer_d: Laga nnyonnyola mu nkola engeri enkuba y’asidi gy’ekosaamu ebimera

question: Omusomesa yasabye abayizi okukola enteekateeka y’okugezesa eno wammanga, nga alina ekigendererwa ky’okubalaga engeri eby’obulamu gye biyitamu mu butoffaali nga tebikozesezza maanyi (passive transport) n’ebintu ebiyungulukuka okuyita mu kinyira: 1. Teeka amazzi agasukali amangi munda mu kapiira akalongoosefu. 2. Teeka akapiira ako mu kintu omuli amazzi agasukali agatali mangi nga agali mu kapiira. 3. Laba ekigenda okubaawo nga wayiseewo akadde katono. Kibuza ki ekiri mu nteekateeka omusomesa gy’akoze okukwanagana n’ekigendererwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Akabonero tekayanguza kulaga ntambula ya solute.
answer_b: Ennyanguyirizi ekkiriza amazzi okuyitawo gwokka
answer_c: Akabonero tekalaga ntambuza ya mazzi nga kisinziira ku mutindo gw'obungi bw'ekintu ekigattiddwa.
answer_d: Enkola tekkiriza kwolesa ntikko z’obutoffaali nga zigenda okusinzira ku kigero ky’obungi bwabyo.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, mu kiseera ky’omusomo ku buzibu bw’obutonde bw’ensi, ateekwa okukebera ekigendererwa kino: “Okutegeera obubi obuva mu kusuulibwa kw’ebintu eby’obuziba ku kuggwaawo kw’ekitangala kya ozone.” Mulimu ki omusomesa ayinza okukozesa okukungaanya obujulizi obukwata ku kutuukirizibwa kw’ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Balirira abayizi okukola engeri CFCs (chlorofluorocarbons) gye ziri mu lubbobbo lw’empewo (stratosphere) n’omuwendo gwa ozone molecules gye bikwatagana.
answer_b: Saba abayizi okunnyonnyola ebiri mu ggulaafu eraga enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw’obuziba bwa ozone mu kitundu kya stratosphere emyaka amakumi ataano egiyise.
answer_c: Saba abayizi bakole akata ky'endowooza akannyonnyola ebinava mu kuggwa kw'ekibikka ky'ozone mu lubanga olw'omukka olwa stratosphere.
answer_d: Saba abayizi okukola ekifaananyi ekiraga ebintu ebikozesebwa mu maka ebyeyambisibwa ebisumulula CFCs (chlorofluorocarbons) mu lubbobbo lwa ozone.

question: Omusomesa akola emirimu gy’okuyiga egy’enjawulo n’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, nga gikwata ku kitundu ky’Ensi n’Obwengula. Mu mirimu ki egiddwa wammanga abayizi mwe bayinza okumanyirawo obukulu bw’essomo ly’ekibalangulo n’eby’emikono mu bulamu obwa bulijjo?
answer_a: Abayizi banoonyereza ku muwendo n'engeri z'ebipooli ebiri mu bwengula nga byetoloola Ensi, era ne bawaayo ekiwandiiko ku mugaso gwabyo eri enkola y'enkola z'okumanya ebifo.
answer_b: Abayizi bakozesa kalenda okuzuula olunaku engeri z’omwezi ez’enjawulo lwe ziggwaawo, era balagula ebifo by’enjuba, ensi, n’omwezi we binaaba biri mu nnaku ez’enjawulo ez’omwezi.
answer_c: Abayizi bannyonnyola empisa enkulu ez’Omwezi era basoma ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku ndaba ya Galileo eyasooka ng’akozesa ttelesikopu ye, gye yakirizaaamu nti obwengula bwayo tebwali bulungi nga bwe bwalabika ku lubereberye.
answer_d: Abayizi balaba vidiyo ekwata ku mulimu gw’ekyuma kya Rosetta probe n’ekitundu kyagyo ekya Philae module, ekyasobola okutukka ku kifo ekiri ku kkometti omulundi ogwasooka mu byafaayo. Oluvannyuma, bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw’omulimu guno ogw’omu bwengula.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya alina enteekateeka y’ekibiina ng’ekigendererwa kye kiri "Okwekenneenya n’okunnyonnyola data ku kukkaanya wakati w’ebintu". Kiki ku bikolwa bino, ekituukana n’essira erissibwa ku nkola y’ebyamagezi mu by’ensoma, ekiyinza okusobozesa abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Balanguza obungi bw’amaanyi (momentum) g’ebintu ebikwatagana mu mbeera eza bulijjo.
answer_b: Kola okunoonyereza ku njawulo eziriwo wakati w'okugong'ana okwa "elastic" n'okwa "inelastic".
answer_c: Weetegereze ebinaavaamu ku nkola y’obulo bwa marubwe, nga osinziira ku bipimo by’embiro zaabwo mu kutomera.
answer_d: Nnyonnyola okukubagana okweyongera okulabika mu vidiyo z’embeera eza bulijjo, ng’olaga ebintu ebikukozesa.

question: Omusomesa atandika omutwe ogw'amaanyi g'amasannyalaze n'obukodyo bw'amasannyalaze mu kibiina kya Siniya. Mu kiseera ky'ekibiina, omusomesa yakizudde nti endowooza enkyamu abayizi ze batera okulaga nga bannyonnyola engeri obutindo bw'amasannyalaze gye bukola, kwe kuba nti "amasannyalaze bwe gayita mu bikozesebwa eby'enjawulo, gaggwaawo." Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okusoomooza butereevu endowooza enkyamu eno ey'abayizi?
answer_a: Labula era ogerageranye obumasamasa bw'ettaala bbiri ez'enjawulo ezikwataganye mu ngeri ey'omuseere ku battery.
answer_b: Labu bbiri ezifanana bwezikwataganyizibwa mu mutungo ogwa seriizi ku bbaatiri, labu ezo zigenda kwaka gitya era oluvannyuma ogerageranye okwaka kwazo.
answer_c: Labu bbiri ez’amasannyalaze bwe zikwataganyiziddwa mu nkola ya paraleli ku bbatiri, labu eyo eyaka ennyo y’eyo erina amaanyi agasingawo. Bw’omala okukola okuteebereza, geraageranya obumasamasa bwazo.
answer_d: Labu bbiri ezifanana bwe ziba zigattiddwa mu nkola ya paraleli ku bbaatiri, laba obumasamasa bwazo bwe buliba butya era obugeregereze.

question: Mu kuteekateeka essomo ly’ekibiina ky’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri ogw’omusembeyo, omusomesa anoonya ebikozesebwa mu kusomesa ebituukirawo ebinaakozesebwa mu kibiina abayizi basobole okugeraageranya obunene n’ob المسافه wakati w’enjuba n’em planet zaayo nga bikwatagana. Mu bikozesebwa mu kusomesa bino wammanga, kiki ekisaanira okukozesebwa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’essomo?
answer_a: Ekifananyi ekiragisa engeri Enjuba n’emibala gyayo gye bifaanana mu bunene.
answer_b: Ekifananyi ekya kompyuta eky'enjuba n'emibala egigyetoolodde nga kiraga obunene bwabyo bwe buli mu butuufu.
answer_c: Akabalaza akalimu ebipimo ku bunene bw'enkulungo n'obuyira bwaazo okuva ku Njuba
answer_d: Omukono ogulaga engeri enjuba n'ebipulaneti byayo gye biri n'obukulu bwabyo n'obuyira wakati waabyo n'enjuba.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka essomo eriddako n'abayizi b'ekibiina ekisooka mu siniya ng'ekigendererwa kiri "Okutegeera obukulu bw'okunoonyereza ku by'omusisa mu kuzimba okumanya ku by'ettaka". Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n'ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Nnyonnyola engeri tekinologiya gy’akozesebwaamu okukozesa empuyiro za ssezzimu okusoma ku ndabika y’omunda ey’ensi.
answer_b: Mu ngeri ki amaanyi agava mu musisi gye gasaasaana okuyita mu mayengo agasooka, agokubiri, n'agomubwengwa?
answer_c: Laga ebyo ebireeta musisi eby'obutonde, gamba ng'enkolagana wakati w'ebipande bya tectonic olw'entambula yaabyo.
answer_d: Londa we nsisi gyasinziira ng'okozesa omutendera ogw'okusimba empuyi ssatu okuyita mu bifo bisatu ebikebera ensisi, nga basinziira ku bipimo by'amaanyi g'ensisi ebifuniddwa mu buli kifo.

question: Okukola ku mulamwa gw'akanyigirizi k'amazzi, omusomesa w'omwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya ateekateeka essomo n'ekigendererwa abayizi okukozesa omulamwa gw'obukwafuwavu nga bageraageranya ebintu eby'enjawulo. Ku ntandikwa y'essomo, omulimu gunaakolebwa okwanjula omulamwa gw'obukwafuwavu. Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, guli ki abayizi gwe balina okukola, oluvannyuma lw'omulimu ogwo ogogambiddwa waggulu, okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'essomo?
answer_a: Labuunirira ebigenda okubaawo ebintu bisatu ebitali bikwatagana bwe biba biteekeddwa mu silinda ey’ebipimo, era nonnyola lwaki ekintu ekyo ekilabikawo kiba kibaddewo.
answer_b: Okukozesa enkola y’okugezesa okuzuula obukwafuwavu bw’ekikulukusi nga osinziira ku bunene bw’akanyigirizi kye kireeta ku ntobo y’ekintu ekikireese.
answer_c: Nsonga lwaki okusaanuuka kw'ebiziba by'omuzira ebya Antatika bwe kukosa obunene bw'amazzi g'ennyanja, nga tusinziira ku buzito bw'omuzira n'amazzi agatonnya.
answer_d: Laga omuwendo ogw’obungi bw’ekintu n’enzatula y’ebintu eby’enjawulo ebipima omuzaligo gwe gumu naye nga birina obunene obw’enjawulo, oba nga bipima obunene bwe bumu naye nga birina omuzaligo ogw’enjawulo.

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero eggattiro ateekateeka essomo n’ekigendererwa ky’okunnyonnyola “Kinematics y’entambula ey’ekikulungo etakyuka.” Okutuukiriza kino, agenda okunnyonnyola nti bwe nsindikirizo ya nguli (ω) ey’akantu eba tekyuka, embiro ya tangent (vt) yeeyongera bwe buziba bw’ekkubo lyayo (R) bwe bweyongera, ng’akozesa omukwanaganyo vt = R·ω. Okutunuulira nti abayizi abamu bayinza okuba nga balina obuzibu okutegeera okunnyonnyola kuno, omusomesa asalawo okwongera ennyingo endala ey’ebiri mu somo lye. Nga bwe kiragiddwa waggulu, ku ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki esinga okuba entuufu okukiikirira ekintu ekyo ekinnyonnyolwa?
answer_a: Kozesa omukwanaganyo okukola omubalanguzo ogw'omutwe, nga okutegeera embiro y'ekizungirizi ky'eggali.
answer_b: Laga olubaa lwa ggraph olulaga omuganda wakati wa leediyasi n'embiro ezigenda ku nkiziira nga omuganda ogwa butereevu wakati w'ebintu ebyo bwe gulabika.
answer_c: Laga nti bw’oba otyoza ekintu ekisibiddwa ku muguwa, omulandira gwakyo ogw’okwetoloola gukyuka, obuwanvu bw’omugwa bwe bukendeezebwa oba bwe bwongezebwa.
answer_d: Gerageranya embiro ezeetoloolevu ez’enjawulo wakati w’obungi bw’ekikopo ekifaanana ng’omutunsi ogusaliddwa, nga kyettoloolera ku lumu ku njuyi zaakyo nga kiteereddwa ku ttaka erigalamidde

question: Omusomesa ategekera ekibiina ky'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya, ng'ekigendererwa kyabwe kiri "Okutegeera empewozeso eya sentripeta n'amaanyi ga sentripeta ng'ebireetera ekintu okutambula mu ngeri ey'omuzingo ogwa kyenkanyi". Mu kumanya okukulembedde kuno okukwata ku vekita kuki abayizi kwe bateekwa okuba nga bamanyi okusobola okutegeera amaanyi ga sentripeta bwe gakola ku ntambula y'omubiri mu ntambula ey'omuzingo ogwa kyenkanyi?
answer_a: Okuggyako vekita
answer_b: Omugatte gwa vekita ezigayamu
answer_c: Omugatte gwa 'dot' wakati wa vekita
answer_d: Okutondeesa vekita nga tukozesa ebipimo bya Katisiyaani

question: Mu ndowooza zino ez'abayizi, eruwa ekoma ku kuyiga omusingi gwa Archimedes?
answer_a: Okulowooza nti puleesa y’omu bbanga terina nnyinirizo ku puleesa ya haidirositatiika eweebwa ekikulukusi
answer_b: Okulowooza nti obuziba ekintu kye kiyimiriddemu mu mazzi kye kireetera amaanyi agakirwanyisa okuba amangi oba amatono.
answer_c: Okulowooza nti akanyigirizi akakolebwa ku kintu ekiri mu mazzi kisinziira ku buziiba we kali
answer_d: Okulowooza nti akanyigirizi ka haidirositetiiki akateekebwa ekikulukusi ku ntobo y'ekintu ekirikulukusirwamu kisinziira ku ndabika y'ekintu ekyo.

question: Mu kitundu ky'amasomo agafuga amazzi n'empewo ekya S3, omusomesa awa omulamwa gw'okuyiga guno: "Nnyonnyola ebintu eby'enjawulo ebibaawo buli lunaku nga tukozesa omusingi gwa Bernoulli." Ku nsonga eyo, ku ngeri eziddwamu wammanga, lwaki olukolera ng'akabonero akasobozesa omusomesa okumanya nti abayizi batuukirizza omulamwa ogwo ogwatuukiriziddwa?
answer_a: Banannyonnyola engeri ebigambo ebikozesebwa mu kyenkanyanjuyi kya Bernoulli gye bitegeerekeka.
answer_b: Banannyonnyola engeri akamooli akasiiga akawunga bwe kakola.
answer_c: Bannyonnyola lwaki obugazi bw’akatonnyeze k’amazzi bukendeera nga bugwa okuva ku ttipa.
answer_d: Bannyonnyola lwaki eccupa ya pulasitiika enyigirizika ng’omukka ogugirimu guggiddwamu.

question: Omusomesa omwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya ali mu kuteekateeka akapyaata akawandiike okukebera ebyo abayizi bye bamanyi ku mutendera gw'okwetoloola. Bwe kiba nti akabonero akamu kwe "Bakozesa emikwanaganyo gy'ekibalangulo eginyonyola okwetoloola okwa bulijjo okugonjoola ebizibu ebitali bimu," ku bino ebiri wammanga kiki ekisinga okuba ekituufu okulaga obusobozi bwabwe?
answer_a: Baala omusindikke gw’ekidongo oguzannya emirundi 5 egy’enjuyi zonna mu dakiika emu, ssaawaati es середняя angular?
answer_b: Okukyuusa kungi n’obunene bw’ekikulungo mu diguli ebifanana n’ekikulungo kya \( \frac{5\pi}{2} \) radiani?
answer_c: Balanguza embiro y’akamyu akagwa ku njuba ng’obunene bwako ku njuba bwe \( R \), singa embiro yaako yali 100 m/s ng’obunene bwako bwali \( \frac{R}{2} \)
answer_d:
Laga omukwanaganyo ogusobola okubala embiro ezeetolooleza okuva mu mbiro y'ekitendero, ng'olaga buli kigambo ky'ekitegeeza:

v = ωr

Wano:
* v ze mbiro ezeetolooleza (tangential speed).
* ω ze mbiro y'ekitendero (angular speed).
* r ze nsalessale y'akazannyo (radius).

question: Omusomesa wa siniya, mu nteekateeka ze z'essomo, ataddewo ekigendererwa nti abayizi balage engeri enkyukakyuka ezibaawo mu busirikale bw'obuziba obwa leediyoaktifu gye zikwatagana n'obugumu bwabwo. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa kye yandikozesezza okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo mu kibiina?
answer_a: Saba abayizi okukiikirira ebifulumizibwa bya nuclide mu nkulukuta y'obusannyalaze erimu obutonde bw'ekibulukusi.
answer_b: Basabye abayizi okutegeera ekika ky’ekifulumizibwa ekiva mu kintu nga basinziira ku ggulaafu y’omusipi gw’obunywevu bw’obuziizi.
answer_c: Baagaliza abayizi okunoonyereza ku maanyi agasindiikiriza n'agaleeta ebiri mu busibe bw'akaziba okusobola okutuuka ku mutindo ogw'obutebenkevu.
answer_d: Balagira abayizi okuteekateeka akatonnyeze akalaga ebika by'obusannyalaze obwa leediyo obuva mu nnyukiriyaasi okusobola okutuuka ku mutindo ogw'obutebenkevu.

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n’ekibiina ky’abaana abali mu mwaka ogw’okusatu ku mutwe gw’Ekyenkanyi mu Buziizi, ng’ekigendererwa kiri “Okwekenneenya enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw’ebintu ebikola ekintu n’ebivaamu mu kikolwa ky’obuziizi,” ng’ayita mu kibalangulo ekiraga omuwendo gw’ekintu mu budde. Bw’aba abuuzizza abayizi be ku mulamwa gw’omuwendo ogw’enkalakkalira ogw’ekyenkanyi, akiraba nti abasinga ku bo basoma bubi ekibalangulo. Kibuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okuyamba abayizi okutegeera enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw’ebintu ebiri mu kikolwa ky’obuziizi nga bakozesa ekibalangulo?
answer_a: Ensibuko y’ekifo abazimba n’ebivaamu we bitandikira ku ggaafu y’eki?
answer_b: Abazadde n'ebivaamu balina obungi bwabwo butya ku ntandikwa y'ekikolwa?
answer_c: Ddi ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kikolwa birekera awo okukozesebwa ate ebiva mu kikolwa ne birekera awo okubaawo?
answer_d: Waliwo obuteeyongerayo mu kukolebwa n'okukozesebwa kw'ebintu ebikola ekintu ekikolebwa?

question: Omusomesa ategese okukola ku kiruubirirwa ky’okulaga enkyukakyuka ya pH mu kukendeeza asidi mu mbeera entegeke mu kibiina kye. N’olwekyo, omusomesa asaba abayizi abakulu okuzimba olukoloboze lw’ekigeranyo ky’okugattika asidi ennafu n’ekintu ekikola obuzzi obwamaanyi, nga bano baweebwa omuwendo n’obungi bw’ebintu byombi. Ng’omulimu bwe gugenda mu maaso, omusomesa akiraba nti abayizi abasinga baakazimba olukoloboze okutuuka ku kifo we bikwatagana, kubanga bafuna omuwendo gwa pH omubi oluvannyuma lw’ekifo ekyo. Ku mirimu egiddirira wano wansi, gumu ku mirimu ki omusomesa gwe yandikozesezza okuluŋŋamya abayizi okumaliriza okuzimba olukoloboze lw’ekigeranyo ky’okugattika?
answer_a: Twala abayizi mu labolatoli basobole okuzuula ekifo ky'obwenkanyi mu nkola.
answer_b: Bannyonnyole nti, nga tukozesa ekipimo kya pH, kyazimbwa nga kyesigamiziddwa ku muwendo ogwa pozitiivu ogw'obungi bw'asidi oba bbeesi.
answer_c: Bannyonnyole, nga nkuwa eky'okulabirako, bw'osobola okumanya omuwendo gw'obuziba obusukkulumu (excess moles) bwa buli kintu mu bitundu eby'enjawulo mu kiseera ky'okukebera (titration).
answer_d: Kozesa pulogulaamu kompyuta omuyizi mw'ayingiza omuzingo gwa ebbaasi egattiddwa, ate enkola n'ewa obubonero okuzimba ekkondo.

question: Mu kibiina ekigendana n’omutwe gw’obutebenkevu bw’ebikemiko, omusomesa wa siniya asomesa ku kiruubirirwa ky’okuyiga “Okunnyonnyola embeera y’obutebenkevu etuukiddwako ebikolwa ebikemiko”. Mu kiseera ky’omulimu, omusomesa akiraba nti abayizi balina obutategeera ku kibuuzo kino kye babuuza: “Ebintu ebikolawo n’ebivaamu bituuka ku butebenkevu byokka byokka?” Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gwe guwanduukiriza omusomesa okuddamu okussa essira ku nkola y’okusomesa n’okuyiga eri abayizi?
answer_a: Laga omuwendo gw'ekikolwa bwe kigenda kityo okutuusa ekitundu ku bintu ebivaamu lwe bikoleka
answer_b: Laga ebyo ebiriwo ku mutendera ogw’obunene n’obutono mu nkola y’ekikemiko okutuusa lwetuuka ku mutindo ogw’obutaggulukuka.
answer_c: Kola enkola y’okugezesa eraga engeri ebintu ebiyinza okutaataganya embeera y’obutaggwaawo mu nkola za kemiko gye bikolera.
answer_d: Kola enkola y’okugezesa ekusobozesa okubala obungi bw’ebintu ebiri mu kikulukusi nga tebikyuka okusinziira ku bungi bwabyo bwe byatandise nabyo.

question: Omusomesa akolera n’ekibiina ky’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya ku mutwe gw’ebyokubugumu n’enkyukakyuka z’ebbugumu. Okusobola okuleetera abayizi okwekenneenya engeri ebbugumu gye litambula mu nkola y’ekintu, akola omukolo ogw’omugaso ng’akozesa gilaasi erimu bbaafu n’endala erimu amazzi agabidde, ku lunaku lw’omutuntu omutemeddwa ng’obudde bwa diguli 20°C. Ekibinja ky’abayizi kigamba nti, mu kiseera kyonna eky’omukolo (eddakiika 60), bbaafu teerisaanuuke n’amazzi agabidde teganaannyogoga. Kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okuleetera abayizi okuddamu okulowooza ku kirowoozo kyabwe okuva mu bumanyirivu buno obw’omugaso?
answer_a: Obubonero bw'obudde bukosa butya enkola y'entegeka?
answer_b: Obupimiro bw'ebbugumu bukwatagana butya n'enkola enteekateeka?
answer_c: Lwaki emirundi mingi twogera ku bintu ebyokya n'ebinyogoga, mu ngeri eno, ku kacaali omunyogovu ne kacaali omwokya?
answer_d: Enjawulo eri wakati w'obwoki bw'embeera n'obwoki bw'ebintu ebiri mu bigira y'eyani?

question: Ekibiina ky'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya bwe beetegekera lipooti y'ekigezo ekirina omutwe "Ebintu Ebikosa Embiro y'Enkyukakyuka." Kiki kye bandibadde basooka okuyiga okusobola okunnyonnyola ebyava mu kigezo ekyo?
answer_a: Etteeka ly'omuwendo gw'ekikolwa
answer_b: Omulamwa gw'obutomera
answer_c: Okunnyonnyola omugatte ogw'enkalubo y'obutonde
answer_d: Ebintu ebikosa obwangu bw'ekikolwa ky'obutonde

question: Omusomesa, mu kiseera ky’essomo ku Mikago gy’Ebirungo, asaba abayizi be okukola omulimu guno ku mutendera ku mutendera: Wandiika endagabuteezi enzijuvu ez’atomi mu molekyu y’amazzi ne amoniya. Loba ebifaanaanyi bya Lewis ebikwatagana ne buli molekyu. Zimba ebifaananyi bya molekyu zombi ng’okozesa ebbumba n’obuti obutono okusinziira ku ndabika yaazo ey’omubiri. Teekawo okufaanagana n’enjawulo wakati w’endabika y’omubiri ey’emolekyu zombi. Ku bino ebikulu ebigendererwa by’okuyiga ebigendereddwa, kiki ekisobola okukeberwa n’omulimu ogwo ogunnyonnyoddwa?
answer_a: Laga bbandi z’obuziba okusinziira ku mbeera y’amasannyalaze g’obutoffaali bwabwo.
answer_b: Kiikirira mugawanyo gwa birondoozi bya masannyalaze munda mu molekyu nga okukozesa ebifaano bya Lewis.
answer_c: Kekkereza engeri atomu gye zisaasaanyizibwamu mu molekyu nga okusinziira ku nkola ya "valence shell electron pair repulsion" (VSEPR).
answer_d: Londa ebikwaso n’ebitakwaso bya elekitulooni mu molekyu nga osinziira ku nteekateeka y’amasannyalaze g’obuziba obugigatta.

question:
Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero lya siniya ayagala abayizi be okutegeera ebintu ebikozesebwa okumanya obunene bw’ekitundu ky’obulamu bw’akaziba ka leediyoakitiivu.
Kiki ekiyinza okukolebwa okuyamba abayizi okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa ekyo?
answer_a: Laga omuwendo ogugenda gukendeera ogw'ekintu ekiralaadiyo nga gweyoleka mu ngeri y'omugereeso.
answer_b: Teebereza ku nkola y'obuwakiso bw'obusirikale bw'ekintu ekirungo ekya leediyo.
answer_c: Gattako amawulire okuva mu mmeeza y'ebipimo by'obuzito okukontana n'ebiseera ku nkyukakyuka y'ebintu eby'obusiraamu.
answer_d: Gegeenya okubulukuka kw'akaziba ka leediyoaktifu era okutegeera omuwendo gw'obusirikale obubulukuse.

question:
Omusomesa w’essomero lya siniya ey’omwaka ogusooka, mu somo ly’Ekigeranyo ky’Obuzito bw’Ebintu Ebikola Ekintu, yeetaaga okukebera okutegeera kw’abayizi ku bukulu bw’ebigeranyo by’obuzito bw’ebintu ebikola ekintu mu kikontaananyo ky’ekemyo ekikwatagana.

Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okuteesa okukakasa okuyiga okwatuukiddwaako?
answer_a: Balaza omuwendo gw'ekigeranyo ky'akazimbulukusa wakati w'ebintu ebikozesebwa n'ebivaamu mu kikolwa.
answer_b: Balanguula obuzito bw'ebintu ebikozesebwa n'ebivaamu era okakase omukwano oguli wakati waabyo mu kubala.
answer_c: Zimba akabalansira akalaga obwenkanankana wakati w'ebintu ebikozesebwa n'ebivaamu, n'omuwendo gwabyo mu buli kikumi.
answer_d: Zimba akatebe akalaga omuganda oguli wakati wa mole, molekyu ne atomu, nga kisinziira ku bintu ebiri mu kikolwa ekyo.

question: Omulimu ki omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’okuna gw’ayinza okuwa abayizi be okukulaakulanya obukugu mu kuteekateeka nga bakola ku mbeera z’ebintu?
answer_a: Lekera akayizi kano okulaga abayizi nti obuzito bw’ekintu ekiri mu mbeera ey’obuziizi tebukyuka nga kikulukusidde.
answer_b: Baagaliza abayizi okuwandiika n'okusiiga ekifaananyi ekiraga engeri y'okukakasa oba amazzi gakyuka obungi bwayo bwe gakyusa embeera yaago.
answer_c: Buuza abayizi okukakasa, nga bakozesa ttamomiita, oba ebbugumu ly'amazzi mu gilaasi likyuka bwe bateekamu bbaafu.
answer_d: Kiki ekinaabaawo ku mazzi, nga gali mu mbeera ey’ekikalubo, bwe ganaaba gateereddwa mu bwokiisi obwa bulijjo?

question: Mu ssomero ly'abaana abato, omusomesa yeetaaga okukebera obumanyirivu bw'omwana ku kintu kino ekikwata ku Mubiri n'Okutambula: Alaga oba ayoleka ebifo by'ebitundu by'omubiri omunda nga omutima, amawuggwe, obwongo. Mu nkola zino ez'okukebera, y'ennene esinga okuba entuufu omusomesa gy'asaanidde okukozesa?
answer_a: Saba abaana okukola eby'omu lubuto omunda nga bakozesa ebbumba era olambule obukugu bwabwe nga okozesa akalango akalambuzi.
answer_b: Saba buli mwana okulonda akatundu k’omubiri gw’omuntu n’awaayo olutalo olukakasa by’alunzeeko. Kungaanya obukakafu okuyita mu mpapula eziraga ebyo bye watunuulidde.
answer_c: Saba abaana okuteeka ebifaananyi by'ebitundu by'omubiri ku kifaananyi ky'omubiri gw'omuntu era okukoppa engeri gye bakozesezzaamu ebipimo.
answer_d: Saba abaana okulaba vidiyo y'omubiri gw'omuntu oluvannyuma mukubaganye ebirowoozo mu bibinja ku bye mulabye. Kungaanya obujulizi okuyita mu biwandiiko eby'obukakafu.

question: Okukyuka kw’embeera y’ebintu kuki abaana abato ab’emyaka egyo gye basobola okulaba nga bakozesa omuko gw’ekyuma ekimulukuta?
answer_a: Okutabika
answer_c: Okukwata
answer_d: Enfuufu

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ky’abaana abato ateekateeka omutwe ogugamba "Okulowooza ng’omusaayansi". Abaana beenyigidde mu bintu ebibayigiriza nga okukola ebigezo n’okuyiga ku ngeri y’okukolamu ebintu mu bwesimbu. Obukugu bwe bagenda okukozesa kwe kulaba n’okuteebereza. Kiki kye yandikozesezza okuyigiriza abaana bano okukulaakulanya obukugu buno?
answer_a: Ekiwandiiko ky'okwetegereza, okuwandiika emiramwa emipya egyayigiddwa mu kugezesa oluvannyuma n'oluvannyuma okufunza.
answer_b: Akakung’aanya k’ebiteeso, okukwatamu ebirowoozo ebyasooka n’okwetegereza ebintu mu ngezeso, ate oluvannyuma okugeraageranya data efuniddwa oluvannyuma.
answer_c: Enkola y’enteekateeka, omuli engeri n’ebirowoozo ebyasooka eby’okugezesa bwe bitegekeddwa, oluvannyuma obumanyirivu ne bulondoolwa.
answer_d: Ebikozesebwa okukungaanya n'okwetegereza ebintu ebiyambako okunoonyereza n'okuzuula ebintu mu ngeri entuufu, oluvannyuma ne tunnyonnyola ebyo bye tuzudde.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika ky’abaana abato akoze ku kigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekigamba nti "Okukolera awamu mu mbeera eza bulijjo, mu bikolwa ebiyamba okukulaakulanya obutonde obugunjufu." Okutuuka ku kino, agabanye abaana obumanyirivu obw’enjawulo: okulaba vidiyo, okukola ppaasita, okukyalira ekifo we bazza obuggya ebintu, n’ebirala. Oluvannyuma, yeetaaga okukebera ekigendererwa ekirondeddwa. Nkola ki ey’okukebera eyinza okuba entuufu okukakasa entuukirizibwa y’ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Kola olukalala ng'okozesa akabonero okulaga ebikolwa abaana bye bakola nga tebalagiddwa mu biseera ebya bulijjo. Ng'ekyokulabirako: okuzikiza omukka gw'amazzi, okukungaanya empapula.
answer_b: Kungaanya obujulizi, okuyita mu mpapula eziraga bye watunudde, obw’endowooza z’abaana nga bawuliriza olugero olw’ebikolwa ebiyamba okukuuma obutonde bw’ensi nga bulamu.
answer_c: Kola olukalala okukakasa oba abaana basobola okwawula ebifaananyi eby’ebikolwa ebiyamba n’ebitayamba mu kutumbula obutonde obugumira. Ng’ekyokulabirako: okukozesa ebintu emirundi mingi, okusuula kasasiro mu kasero.
answer_d: Kungaanya amawulire okuyita mu lukalala olw'okwekenneenya ebirowoozo by'abaana oba endowooza zaabwe nga balaba vidiyo eraga embeera ezitayamba ku kulabirira obutonde bw'ensi. Ng'ekyokulabirako: okukozesa amazzi mu ngeri etaliimu magezi, okusuula kasasiro ku lubalama lw'ennyanja

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekyokusatu yagejjeza, mu kitundu ekikwata ku Kulabirira Eby’obutonde, ekigendererwa "Okutegeera Eteeka lya 3R mu bikolwa ebirabika". Okukola kino, yawa abayizi omulimu mwe baalina okuwandiika ekikolwa ekya bulijjo ku buli kiti ekigendererwa: Okukendeeza, Okuddamu Okukozesa, Okuzza Obuggya. Omu ku bayizi yawaayo eby’okuddamu bino wammanga: 1. Okukozesa masiki ezinaazibwa. 2. Okusimba ebimera mu bintu omuteekwa bbaata. 3. Okwawula n’okutereeza ebintu ebigenda okusuulibwa awaka. Kutegeeza ki okuva eri omusomesa okuyinza okuyamba omuyizi okutereera n’okulung’amizibwa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateekebwawo?
answer_a: Eky'okulabirako kirungi nnyo! Naye aba "R" bonna weebali? Nkusaba okuddamu ebibuuzo bino: Kiki ekikozesebwa okukendeeza ku byetaago oba okufuna ebyo byokka ebyetaagisa? Nkola ki empya gy'oyoyogera okumaliriza okuddamu kwo?
answer_b: Mazima ddala ebyokulabirako birungi! Naye aba "R" bonna weebali? Nkusaba owandiike amakulu ga buli "R" ku bano abasatu: Okukendeeza, Okuddamu okukozesa, n'Okuzza obuggya, ng'ogoberera ebyokulabirako, ate oluvannyuma oddemu ekibuuzo kino: Ku nkola zino, gy'olowooza nti esinga okuba ey'omugaso mu bulamu obwa bulijjo?
answer_c: Ngeri ki ze wandi ssedde okuteeka mu nkola ku ssomero? Oyinza otya okukubiriza muyizi munno okufuna engeri empya ez’okukozesa ebintu mu kifo ky’okubisuula?
answer_d: Ebyokulabirako birungi nnyo! Naye wabuzeewo "R". Okumaliriza eky'okuddamu, nkukubiriza okuddamu ebibuuzo bino: Lwaki ebikolwa bino birungi eri okulabirira eby'obugagga eby'obutonde? Ku kigero ki we bikwatagana n'okukendeeza kasasiro n'obucaafu ku nsi?

question: Ggwe omwana ow’ekibiina kyakusatu ayinza kukozesa mulimu ki okulaga engeri enjuba gy’ekusirikiramu n’okigamba banno?
answer_a: Bafuna olupapula oluliiko obwetoloovu obutaliiko kintu buwandiikeko obukiikirira enjuba era ne basiga langi enzirugavu okukiikirira ekisiikirize ky'omwezi mu bitundu ebitali bimu eby'ekikunkumuka kw'enjuba okujjuvu era ne bannyonnyola omutendera gw'ekintu ekyo.
answer_b: Bakozesa omumuli okumulisa akapiira ak'ebbala eryeru akakiikirira Ensi ne balaba ekisiikirize n'enkula yaakyo ku lubaawo era ne bawandiika bye balaba.
answer_c: Bano bakiikirira enjuba nga bakozesa ttaala era bamulisa ekitangaala kyayo ku lubaawo olweru olukiikirira Ensi; oluvannyuma, nga bakozesa akapiira akatono ke batambuuza mpola mu maaso g’ettaala, balaba engeri enkula y’ekitundu ekimulisiddwa ku lubaawo gyekyuka.
answer_d: Bakiikirira enjuba n’etala, Ensi n’omutwe gwabwe nga bagiggya enjala nga batunuulidde ewala okuva ku kitangaala, n’Omwezi nga bakozesa bbulaani enjeru gwe bakutte mu mukono nga bagolodde omukono, era mpolampola beetoloola okukontana n’engeri zeggaali bwe zeetoloola, nga balaba ekibaawo ku kutangaala kw’ebbulaani.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika kya ‘lower nursery’ ateekateeka okukungaanya obujulizi ku kanyonyi akalaga omutindo gw’ekitundu ekikulu ekiyitibwa Obuntu n’Okutambula: Alaga ebitundu by’omubiri bye amanyi ng’abiraga n’engalo bw’aba abiyise. Okukungaanya obujulizi ng’obwo, omusomesa agenda kukozesa vidiyo n’ebiwandiiko ebinnyonnyola. Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’erina engeri esobola okukeberebwa okutuukiriza akanyonyi akalaga omutindo?
answer_a: Mu biseera by’okuzannya eby’obwereere mu kisenge, omuntu omukulu atuula okumpi n’endabirwamu era omwana bw’asemberera, amubuuza ebitundu by’obwenyi bwe eby’enjawulo we biri.
answer_b: Mu biseera eby’enjawulo eby’okukola ebintu, omuntu omukulu abuuzizza omwana ku nkola ez’enjawulo ez’obwongo era n’amusaba akwate ku kitundu ky’obwenyi bwe ekikwatagana na buli emu.
answer_c: Mu kiseera eky’okukyusa ebintu, omuntu omukulu ayimba ennyimba ez’enjawulo ezikwata ku bitundu by’obwenyi, ng’abikwatako ku mubiri gwe era ng’alaba oba omwana abiddamu.
answer_d: Mu kiseera ky'okulamusa, omuntu omukulu akola ebintu eby'enjawulo ng'akozesa ebitundu by'omubiri gwe, gamba ng'okukuba emikono, okutambuza ebigere n'omutwe; oluvannyuma n'asaba abaana okukoppa ebikolwa ebyo.

question: Omusomesa w'abaana abato ateekateeka omulamwa gw'essaayansi ng'asinziira ku ndagiriro eno okuva mu mutwe gw'Eby'obutonde obwetoolodde: "Okuteebereza ebinavaawo olw'ebintu ebibaawo mu butonde bye tulaba, nga tusinziira ku bye tumanyi n'ebyo bye tumaze okuyitamu." Ku miramwa gy'okuyiga egiddirira, gumu ku gyo gusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Laga vidiyo ennyonnyola engeri embuyaga gye zikolebwa. Oluvannyuma, mu kibinja ekinene, yita abaana okwogera ku byo bye bayitamu, okuyita mu bibuuzo bino: Watabaawo mu muyaga? Kiki ekyaliwo mu mbeera y'obuntu?
answer_b: Lagawo omufaananyo ogulaga olukalu lw’ennyanja mu kikaatiro eky’endabirwamu. Oluvannyuma, kozesa amazzi ag’amaanyi okukoppa tsunamii, saba abaana okwetegereza ebigenda mu maaso era obabuulire ekibuuzo: Kiki ekyabaddewo amazzi bwe gazze waggulu okudda ku lukalu?
answer_c: Saba abaana bakole ekisozi ky’omuliro nga bakozesa ebbumba mu bubinja obutono, nga bagoberera ebiragiro ebiweereddwa. Oluvannyuma, beerimbise ng’ekisozi ky’omuliro kiruka era obabuulire: Muyinza okunnyonnyola kye mulabye? Okuruka kwabaddewo kutya?
answer_d: Tegeka olukungaana lw'emboozi n'abaana ku bumanyirivu bwabwe ku musisi. Oluvannyuma, bayite okwetegereza, mu kyokulabirako, okukoppa omusisi era obabuze: Mwandinnyonnyola mutya ekyabaddewo? Kiriiko mukka ki gwe kinaaba nakyo ku bibuga?

question: Omusomesa ow’abaana abato akolera wamu n’abaana ku kiruubirirwa kino okuva mu mutendera gw’Okunoonyereza ku Mbeera y’Obutonde: "Okukuba ebigereko n’ebintu ebigattiddwa n’ebisaanuuke nga tukozesa ebintu ebikozesebwa bulijjo, gamba ng’ebitoogo by’essaabuuni, amazzi agalamu n’omuceere ogw’ekikere, nga twogera ku nkyukakyuka ezilabika." Okutuukiriza kino, abakowoola okwetaba mu kugezesa "Enkuba y’Ebbala." Kino kizingiramu okuyiwa amazzi, oluvannyuma amafuta, era oluvannyuma amatondo g’ebbala ly’emmere mu kajjiko akalabirira, nga bayambibwa omuntu omukulu. Bw’akola kino, omusomesa abuuzizza abaana, "Kiki ekigenda mu maaso?" Antonio, omu ku baana, addamu, "Njagala amabala g’ossaamu." Ku bikolwa bino wammanga omusomesa by’akola ki ekiyamba Antonio okutuukiriza ekyo ekiruubirirwa?
answer_a: Ekyo kirungi nti wabisiimye, Antonio. Kiki ky'osinga okwagala? Kati, weetegereze ebintu ebirala, gamba ng'amazzi n'amafuta tebitabise.
answer_b: Nga kya muggwaamu, Antonio, nange nnali njagadde langi ze twakozesezza. Wakirabye nti bwe ziba mu mafuta, zibeera ng’obutuli?
answer_c: Antonio, nsuubira nti owuliddeko obulungi langi ze twakozesezza. Osobola okumbuulira oba olaba enjawulo yonna wakati w’ebirangi ebiri mu mafuta n’ebyo ebyatuuka dda mu mazzi?
answer_d: Kirungi nnyo, Antonio, banno mu kibiina baagala langi ze twakozesezza. Kati nkusaba otunule ku ekyo ekigenda okubaawo ku langi zino ku nkomerero y’okugezesa.

question: Mu kibiina kya munaana, oluvannyuma lw’okumaliriza okunnyonnyola omulimu gw’ebitundu by’obutoffaali mu butoffaali bwa kika kya eukaryotic, omusomesa agenda kwongera okunnyonnyola omulimu gwabyo ng’akozesa olugero olufaananya ebyuma n’ebitundu by’ekkolero ku butoffaali. Mu ngero zino omusomesa z’agenda okwogerako, eruwa ku zino ekwatagana ne cytoskeleton?
answer_a: Ekyuma ekikyusa ebintu ebiramu okubifuula amaanyi
answer_b: Enkola etegeka ebintu mu ngeri esobozesa ebintu okutereera mu kkolero
answer_c: Ekifo ekikulu ekikulukusa amawulire agakwata ku kikolero era ne kiragira ebikolebwa mu kyo
answer_d: Ekyuma ekissa akabonero ku bintu ebiggyibwa mu ফ্যাক্টরি

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana akizudde nti abayizi be bazibuwalirwa okutegeera omulamwa gw’ekikululo. N’olwekyo, ateekateeka omukolo ogugenda okubasobozesa okutegeera engeri ekika kino eky’entambula etali ya maanyi gye kibaawo. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukozesa okunyweza okutegeera kw’abayizi be ku nkola y’ekikululo?
answer_a: Ggamba abayizi okubikka akatundulu akazito ka gramu 10 mu mazzi agalinga agamu (isotonic medium) aga 0.9% eya sodium chloride. Oluvannyuma lw'eddakiika 15, gggyamu akatundulu ako, opime obuzito bwako, era obugeraageranye n'obuzito bwakyo obwasooka. Nnyonnyola ekyabaddewo ku ntambula y'amazzi.
answer_b: Ggamba abayizi okubikka akasawo k’omuwumbo mu glasi y’amazzi agannyogovu balabe ekigenda mu maaso. Oluvannyuma, obikke akasawo k’omuwumbo akalala mu glasi y’amazzi agabuguma balabe ekigenda mu maaso. Nnyonnyola enkola y’entambula ebaawo n’engeri ebbugumu gye likosaamu obudde obutwala omusaayi gw’omuwumbo okusaasaana mu glasi yonna.
answer_c: Laga omulimu guno nga okukozesa ebifaananyi: Jjuza bbeka n'amazzi otonnyese akatonnyeze k'obuwunga bw'ekyenvu munda. Laba ekigenda okubaawo ku buwunga bw'ekyenvu era obuuze ebibuuzo okumanya nti obuwunga bw'ekyenvu butondekawo ekigerageranyo ky'amaanyi okusinziira ku bungi oba amaanyi g'obuwunga bw'ekyenvu obusaasaana mu mazzi.
answer_d: Laga olubaawo olulina ebisenge bibiri nga byawuddwaamu akabindi akalekera obutoffaali obutono okuyita. Laga obutoffaali obusoluse nga butono, nga bungi mu kimu ku bisenge, bala obutoffaali mu bisenge byombi era olabe ng’omutendera gw’amazzi gwe gumu. Oluvannyuma lw’eddakiika 5, laga olubaawo lwe lumu, bala obutoffaali obusigaddewo mu bisenge byombi era olabe ng’omutendera gw’amazzi gukyuse, nga gwongerekedde mu kisenge omuli obutoffaali obungi.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omunaana ateekateeka essomo ku ngeri ennima y’obutoffaali obuzimba ebintu ebyekusifu bw’efaanana era n’ateesa nti abayizi bakwataganye enkulaakulana ennene ey’enkola y’ebinyira munda mu butoffaali n’omulimu gwayo. Ku mirimu gy’okusoma egiddwa wansi, guli ki ogugenda okusobozesa abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateekateekebwa?
answer_a: Teeka ebifaananyi ebitono ennyo by'obutoffaali obuzimba ebintu era obabuulire okumanya omulimu gwa buli kanyama akali mu butoffaali obwo.
answer_b: Basabe okusiiga ku kifaananyi ekitono ennyo ky'akatonniinya akakola ebintu ekkubo ly'ebipooli okuyita mu nkola y'okufulumya ebintu ebiva mu butoffaali era n'olyoka abannyonnyola.
answer_c: Leeta ekifaananyi ky'akataffaali akakola obutindo n'ekirala ky'akataffaali k'emisajja, era obagambe okugeraageranya emirimu gy'ebintu ebyawula ebika byombi.
answer_d: Leeta ekifaananyi ky'akatonniinya akakola ebintu ebikuumiddwa n'ekirala ky'akatonniinya k'omusuwa, oluvannyuma obagambe okumanya omulimu gw'obutonniinya bwombi okusinziira ku ndabika yabwo.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana atandika omutwe ogw’obutaffaali. Okukola kino,annyonnyola enjawulo enkulu wakati w’obutaffaali bwa kkayokyaati ne pulokyaati, gamba ng’okubaawo oba obutabaawo bw’obusirikale mu byo. Bw’amala, omuyizi abuuza: “Butaffaali bwa pulokyaati busobola butya okweyabuluzaamu?” Nga tutunuulidde omutendera gw’omuyizi, kwe kunnyonnyola kw’omusomesa okukozeseddwa okusobola okuddamu ekibuuzo kye mu ngeri etegeerekeka era ng’ekwatagana n’ensonga eno?
answer_a: Obutoffaali bwa prokaryotic buzaala, naye mu ngeri eteri ya kikaba, ekitegeeza nti tewali kutabika kwa birungo ebiri mu butoffaali, nga bwe kiba mu butoffaali bwa eukaryotic.
answer_b: Obusobozi bw’akataffaali okweyabuluza businziira ku kubaawo kwa DNA, oba waliwo obuziizi oba nedda. Mu mbeera eno, obutaffaali bwa pulokalyooti ne yukaryooti byombi birina DNA.
answer_c: Okutomeguka kw'obutaffaali bwe kikolwa ekitondekawo obutaffaali obupya bubiri okuva mu butaffaali obuzaale. Obutaffaali obwa pulokalyooti n'obwa yukaryooti byombi birina akakwate kano.
answer_d: Obutoffaali obutalina busirikale, nga bwekyo obutoffaali bwa pulokaryotiiki, bulina ebintu bya jjinnetiiki. Mubo, enkola ya binary fission ebeerayo, omuli DNA okukoppebwa ate oluvannyuma ekikulukusi ky’obutoffaali ne kyeyawulamu, ne kivaamu obutoffaali bubiri obwenkanankana obunene.

question: Mu kukebera okw’akamalirizo, omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omunaana ategese ekigendererwa kino: “Okunnyonnyola emisingi gy’ennyingo ya Dalton ku atomu.” Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga nti abayizi batuuse ku kigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Bikola ebintu eby'ekimiyiki eby'enjawulo okusinziira ku kulonda eby'obuziba bibiri oba okusingawo.
answer_b: Zimuteekawo omuwendo gw’obungi bw’obuziba obwetabye mu kikolwa eky’ekemiko.
answer_c: Zigikwataganya obuzito bw'ebintu ebiri mu kintu ekigatte n'obuzito bw'ekintu ekigatte kyonna.
answer_d: Bakakasa obuzito bw'ekintu ekiri mu bizimbamubiri bisatu eby'enkalubo y'emu.

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibiina eky'omukaaga, ku nkomerero y'eklassi ku nkola y'emmere, agenderera okukakasa oba abayizi bategeera omulimu gw'ebiramu ebireetawo emmere. Ku mirimu eginaakolebwa abayizi, ki ku kino ekinaasobozesa okukebera okuyiga kwabwe?
answer_a: Kituukirize ekifaananyi ky'ekirimwa okukulaga ebintu bye kyetaaga n'ebyo kireetawo mu kiseera ky'ekikolwa ky'okukola emmere.
answer_b: Wa ebyokulabirako by'ebiramu ebikola emmere (producer organisms).
answer_c: Singa ebimera bibulawo, kiki ekiyinza okubaawo mu butonde bw’ebiramu?
answer_d: Teekawo enkolagana wakati w'ebiramu ebikola omutimbagiro gw'emmere.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, mu somero erikwata ku bintu ebikola ku nkola y’ebimera ey’okukola emmere, agenda kwogera ku nkola y’okubaga ebirowoozo. Ku bikolwa by’omusomesa bino wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okuyamba abayizi okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Wa wano we wali ebivuddemu mu kunoonyereza ku ngeri obungi bw'omusana gye bukosa ebimera awamu n'endowooza eyakozesebwa, abayizi basobole okugikkiriza oba okugigaana.
answer_b: Teekawo enteekateeka y'okugezesa, ekirimwa we kyakumulizibwa ebyeyo by'amasannyalaze eby'enjawulo, era nga okusinziira ku kunoonyereza kw'okugezesa, abayizi balondoola ebintu ebiri mu kunoonyerezebwa.
answer_c: Obubugumu n'obunnyogovu bikola bitya ku nkola y'ebimera ey'okukola emmere (photosynthesis)?
answer_d: Waaliwo endowooza ez’enjawulo ezisobola okuddamu ekibuuzo kino ekikulu: “Omugatte gwa CO2 gwe gukosa gutya obungi bw’emmere ebimera gye bikola?” abayizi basobole okulonda ennungi:

question: Omusomesa omuto ow’omu mwaka ogusooka mu siniya y’asomesa ku musingi gwa Darwin ogw’enkyukakyuka y’ebiramu. Emu ku bigendererwa kwe kusobozesa abayizi okutegeera nti ebika by’ebiramu ebiri mu nkolagana ey’okuva mu bintu bye bimu gye byava gye biri kumpi mu byafaayo. Mu kukebera okw’omutendera, akizuula nti abayizi abamu tebannategeera nsonga eno. Ku mirimu gino wammanga, guli ki oguyinza okusobozesa abayizi bano okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateekebwawo?
answer_a: Londa ebimera okusinziira ku ngeri gye bifaanana mu ndabika.
answer_b: Ddamu ebibuuzo nga osinziira ku kunoonyereza okukoleddwa ku kladogramu.
answer_c: Lambaala dayagula eraga ebyokulabirako by'ebisigalira ebitereevu n'ebitali bitereevu.
answer_d: Gerageranya ebimyuuka by'ebitundu by'omubiri ebitali bikola nnyo mu biramu eby'enjawulo okukakasa enkolagana yaabyo.

question: Omusomesa ow’omwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya ateekateeka essomo erigendereddwa okuyamba abayizi okutegeera omugaso gw’okugemesa okw’ekikolimo mu by’obulamu bw’abantu bonna. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga ekiyinza okusobozesa omusomesa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino okutambulira wamu n’endagaano y’ebiri mu syllabus ekwata ku kumanya okw’ekisaayansi?
answer_a: Ban ব্যাখ্যা করে Edward Jenner এর মত ক্লাসিক পরীক্ষার ফলাফলের উপর ভিত্তি করে টিকাকরণের প্রভাব।
answer_b: Banoonyereza, nga basinziira ku chati, obungi bw’endwadde ezimu ezisiigala era ne bateebereza ebireeta obungi obwo.
answer_c: Bageraageranya, nga basinziira ku chati, omuwendo gw'abantu abaagemeebwa ne bagukwataganya n'okusaanyizibwawo n'okuddamu okubalukawo kw'endwadde ezimu.
answer_d: Bazimba olukalala lw'ebikulu ebyatuukiddwaako mu nkola y'okugema, nga balaga omukono gw'abasaayansi abaatandikawo omulimu guno.

question: Mu kibiina kya S.2, ng’ekigendererwa ky’abayizi kwe kutegeera omutendera gw’ebisa eggi n’omutendera gw’ennyingo y’omubuto, akabinja k’abayizi kawanika ekiwandiiko ku mutendera guno. Ng’annyonnyola omukolo gw’okuva kw’eggi, omuyizi agamba: “Akalobo kano bwe kamala okukula n’ekitundu kya luteinizing hormone ne kyeyongera, kava mu busa bw’eggi ne kirekera awo okukola estrogen. Oluvannyuma, ekitundu ekipya kiyimirira mu busa bw’eggi ekiyitibwa corpus luteum, ekitandika okukola progesterone.” Buzibu ki mu kutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’ekibiina ekirabika mu kuddamu kw’omuyizi ono?
answer_a: Nga tutunuulira nti okubula kwa omwe ku misuwa egiri mu butaffaali bw'enkizi kwe kuleeta okukula kw'eggwa ly'ekikyenkanyi.
answer_b: Nga bwe kiragibwa nti okuva kw'eggimu tekusinziira ku bungi bw'ebizigo bya gonodotropiki mu musaayi
answer_c: Okukola enkolagana enkyamu wakati w'ebitundu by'omuzannyo gw'enkwaso n'obuwangwa obuleeta enkwaso obuyingira mu byo.
answer_d: Nga tutadde mu ndowooza nti akatimba ka corpus luteum katandikirawo kokka mu ggwe ly'enkizi era nga tekaava mu kintu ekyasookawo mu kitundu kino.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekisooka mu siniya, mu mutwe gw’ensonga ogwa Ekintu n’amaanyi mu butonde bw’ebiramu, agenda kukozesa akakodyo k’okukebera okukulaakulana kw’omuyizi okukakasa obutuukirivu bw’ekigendererwa kino: “Okutegeera omukwano wakati w’entekateeka y’okukola eby’emmere kw’ebimera n’ey’okussa kw’obutaffaali bw’ebiramu”. Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gusobola okukakasa obutuukirivu bw’ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Komawoyo ekyaati eraga enjawulo enkulu wakati w'enkola ya fotosentezesi n'enkola y'okussa kw'obutaffaali
answer_b:
Okutangaaza kw'ebimera n'okussa kw'obutaffaali bikulu nnyo mu kutereeza embeera y'obutonde bwonna. Okutangaaza kw'ebimera kye kikola emmere yabyo nga bikozesa omusana, amazzi, n'empewo eya kaboni dayokisaidi okukola sukaali n'empewo ya okisijeni. Empewo ya okisijeni efulumizibwa mu kutangaaza kw'ebimera ye gye tukozesa okussa. Sukaali ye mmere y'ebimera.

Okussa kw'obutaffaali bwo kwo kwe kukozesa sukaali n'empewo ya okisijeni okufuna amaanyi agasobozesa ebimera n'ensolo okukola emirimu gyabyo egy'enjawulo. Mu kussa kw'obutaffaali, empewo eya kaboni dayokisaidi n'amazzi bifuuka bya nkwaso. Empewo eya kaboni dayokisaidi efulumizibwa mu kussa kw'obutaffaali ye gye bikozesa mu kutangaaza kw'ebimera.

Bino byombi, okutangaaza kw'ebimera n'okussa kw'obutaffaali, bikolera wamu okutereeza embeera y'obutonde. Okutangaaza kw'ebimera kyongeza empewo ya okisijeni mu butonde, ate era kyongeza n'emmere eriwo. Okussa kw'obutaffaali kyongeza empewo eya kaboni dayokisaidi mu butonde, ate era kyongeza n'amaanyi eri ebimera n'ensolo. Singa tebiriwo, embeera y'obutonde yandiyonooneddwa.
answer_c:
Omubalanguzo gw'ebikemiko ogw'ekifotoosentezesi n'ogw'okussa kw'obutaffaali, omukwataganyo gwabyo gwe gusaliddwaako.

Ekifotoosentezesi: 6CO₂ + 6H₂O + Ekitangaala → C₆H₁₂O₆ + 6O₂

Okussa kw'obutaffaali: C₆H₁₂O₆ + 6O₂ → 6CO₂ + 6H₂O + Amaanyi (ATP)
answer_d: Lambaala akabonero k’ebitundu by’akatuundiro omubaawo ekikolwa kya fotosentezesi n’ekikolwa ky’okussa omukka okw’obuwangaazi, ng’olaga ebintu ebikozesebwa mu buli kikolwa.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna mu siniya yassaawo ekiruubirirwa eri abayizi be okutegeera engeri enzayimu ze zikolamu mu kukoppololwa kwa DNA. # Okukozesa Ennukuta za Sayansi (Scientific Notation): Omulongoosa gw'okwegezaamu

**Ekitundu 1: Okutegeera Ennukuta za Sayansi**

Ennukuta za sayansi ngeri mpimpi ey'okuwandiika ennamba ennene ennyo oba entono ennyo. Mu kifo ky'okuwandiika zeero nnyingi, tukozesa amannya g'ekumi (powers of ten).

Ennamba mu nnukuta za sayansi eba mu ndabika eno:

a x 10<sup>b</sup>

"a" ennamba wakati wa 1 ne 10 (okutwalira awamu 1, naye nga totwalidde 10)
"b" amannya g'ekumi (power of ten), ge galaga emirundi emeka akakomo we kalina okusimbulizibwa okufuna ennamba entuufu.

**Eky'okulabirako 1: Ennamba Ennene**

Wandiika 6,700 mu nnukuta za sayansi.

*   Simbuliza akakomo okutuusa nga waliwo ennamba emu yokka etali zeero ku kkono kw'akakomo: 6.700
*   Bala emirundi emeka akakomo ke kasimbuliziddwa: Emirundi 3
*   Olw'okuba twasimbulizza akakomo ku kkono, amannya g'ekumi (power of ten) gaba gassaawe (positive): 10<sup>3</sup>
*   N'olwekyo, 6,700 mu nnukuta za sayansi ze 6.7 x 10<sup>3</sup>

**Eky'okulabirako 2: Ennamba Entono**

Wandiika 0.00042 mu nnukuta za sayansi.

*   Simbuliza akakomo okutuusa nga waliwo ennamba emu yokka etali zeero ku kkono kw'akakomo: 4.2
*   Bala emirundi emeka akakomo ke kasimbuliziddwa: Emirundi 4
*   Olw'okuba twasimbulizza akakomo ku ddyo, amannya g'ekumi (power of ten) gaba matuufu (negative): 10<sup>-4</sup>
*   N'olwekyo, 0.00042 mu nnukuta za sayansi ze 4.2 x 10<sup>-4</sup>

**Ekitundu 2: Okwegezaamu**

Kozesa emiwendo egiri mu mmeeza eno okukola okwegezaamu kuno.

**Ekitundu 3: Okukola Embalirira nga okozesa Ennukuta za Sayansi**

Ennukuta za sayansi zituyamba okukola embalirira amangu era nga si nzibu.

**Eky'okulabirako 1: Okugattako n'Okutolako**

Okugatta oba okutolako ennamba mu nnukuta za sayansi, amannya g'ekumi (powers of ten) galina okuba nga genkana.

(3.2 x 10<sup>4</sup>) + (1.5 x 10<sup>4</sup>) = (3.2 + 1.5) x 10<sup>4</sup> = 4.7 x 10<sup>4</sup>

Okukubisa, kubisa ennamba eziri mu maaso, ate era ogatte amannya g'ekumi (powers of ten). Okugabiza, gabiza ennamba eziri mu maaso, ate era okolye amannya g'ekumi (powers of ten).

(2.0 x 10<sup>3</sup>) x (3.0 x 10<sup>2</sup>) = (2.0 x 3.0) x 10<sup>(3+2)</sup> = 6.0 x 10<sup>5</sup>

(6.0 x 10<sup>6</sup>) / (2.0 x 10<sup>2</sup>) = (6.0 / 2.0) x 10<sup>(6-2)</sup> = 3.0 x 10<sup>4</sup>

question: Omusomesa w’omu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya ng’ateekateeka amasomo gye agenda okusomesa ku Kinematics. answer_a: Bannyonnyola engeri omulamwa gw'okwanguya okukwatagana n'ensi bwe gukozesebwa okugonjoola ebizibu ebya bulijjo
answer_b: Banannyonnyola engeri endowooza y'okwanguya okusikirizibwa kw'ensi gy'ekulakulanye mu byafaayo by'omuntu.
answer_c: Bannyonnyola engeri enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya gy’ezzeeko okukkiriza okutuukiriza obutuufu obusingako mu kupima omuwendo gw’amaanyi agasikayo ebintu.
answer_d: Banannyonnyola engeri omubiri gye gugwamu nga teguumirizibwa kintu kyonna n’engeri okugwa kuno gye kwesigamye ku bwangu bw’amasoboza agasikayo ebintu.

question: Mu bitabo by’amasomero ebisinga obungi, mu kusoma ku masannyalaze n’ebizungirizi by’amasannyalaze agolokofu, “omugera gw’amazzi” gukozesebwa okwongera okutegeera emiramwa nga obungi bw’amasannyalaze ag’amaanyi n’amaanyi g’amasannyalaze, n’ebirala. answer_b: Kizzaamu abayizi amaanyi okukkiriza nti amasannyalaze "gasobola okukka" mu waya, naye "tegasobola kwambuka".

question: Mu kibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, abayizi beenyigira mu bikolwa ebikwaata ku ngeri ebifaananyi gye bikolebwamu mu ndabirwamu empanvu ne mu ndabirwamu enkovu. Mu kiseera ky’ekikolwa, omuyizi agolola omukono gwe waggulu n’agamba: "Mwalimu, sikyategeera njawulo eri wakati w’ebifaananyi ebituufu n’ebifaananyi ebyekiise, wadde lwaki biyitibwa bitya." Kulaga ki omusomesa kw’anaakozesa okutangaaza okutabuka kw’omuyizi, ng’addamu mu ngeri etegeerekeka era n’obwegendereza obukulu ku kibuzo kye?
answer_a: Laba ku ludda olumu n'olulala olw'ekijiiko. Ekifaananyi ky'olaba nga bw'oli ddala kiba kya bweru ate ekifaananyi ky'olaba nga kikyuse kiba kya nnamaddala.
answer_b: Olukijjukira nti ebifaananyi ebituufu bulijjo biba bikkiddwa waggulu okudda wansi, ate ng’ebifaananyi eby’obulimba bulijjo biba bitereevu.
answer_c: Ebifaananyi eby'obulimba birabika ng'ibikolebwa emabega w'endabirwamu, ate nga ebifaananyi ebya ddala bikolebwa mu maaso gaayo era bisobola okukubibwa ku lutimbe.
answer_d: Ebifaananyi eby’obulimba bikolebwa mu kifo eky’obulimba ekireetera emiryango gy’omusana okugaziwa, ate ebifaananyi ebya ddala bikolebwa okuyita mu kulagula emiryango gy’omusana egidda waggulu.

question: Omusomesa omuto ow’omwaka ogw’okubiri, mu masomo ge ag’ebiramu aga Physics, agenda kukolera wamu n’abayizi be ku kiruubirirwa kino: “Okutegeera amateeka ga Newton n’okugakozesa okunnyonnyola embeera eza bulijjo”. answer_b: Omubiri bwe guba nga tegunyeenya, tewabaawo maanyi gakukolerako; embiro zongera zigenda mu kkubo limu n'engeri omubiri gye gutambula.

question: Omusomesa w'ekibiina eky'okubiri mu siniya, akola akakodyo k'okukebera okumanya oba abayizi batuukirizza ekigendererwa kino: "Okulaga nti bategeera nti okumanya ebikwata ku Bwengula kukyuka era kweyongera okusinziira ku bujulizi obupya." Kiraga ki ekisinga obulungi okukozesa okukebera omuyizi bw'atuukirizza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Nnyonnyola mu ngeri etali ya kubala ngeri Ensi yonna gye yakulaakulanaamu okusinziira ku Big Bang theory.
answer_b: Lagawo engeri emikutu gy’omu bwengula gye gibumbulukuka okuva mu kukung’aana olw’amaanyi agasikayo ebintu.
answer_c: Gerageranya engeri ennungi n’obunafu obuli mu ngeri ez’enjawulo ez’okunnyonnyola bw’obutonde bw’ensi bwe bukulaakulanye.

question: Omusomesa w’eky’omubiri ow’omwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, mu mutwe gw’eky’ensengeka y’ebintu ebiri mu mugendo, agenda kukola okukebera okuzuula okumanya abayizi kwe balina ku ntambula y’ebintu ebigwa nga tebikoleddwako maanyi gonna. answer_c: Balaga mu kiifananyi obwolekera bw’amasoboza agaleetawo emisinde gy’akapiira k’omupiira ogw’ettaniisi nga kali mu bbanga okuva eri omuzannyi omu okudda eri omulala.
