question: Ku nkomerero y’ekibiina ekisooka ku kigambululo kya Doppler ku lw’amayengo g’amaloboozi, omusomesa akola akakeeno okulaba oba abayizi bategeera. Emu ku nsonga eziri mu kakeeno eno egamba nti: Mu kigambululo kya Doppler ku mayengo g’amaloboozi, omusinde gw’okusaasaana kw’amaloboozi gwakyuka? Nnyonnyola. Omuyizi addamu bwati: “Omusinde gukyuka kubanga gyesigamiziddwa ku bugazi bw’amayengo n’obuwanvu bwago, era byombi bikyuka mu kigambululo kya Doppler.” Kutegeeza ki omusomesa kw’asaanidde okukozesa okuluŋŋamya omuyizi okusobola okutegeera ensobi ye n’agigonjoola?
answer_a: Si kituufu ddala okugamba nti obungi bw’amayengo n’obuwanvu bw’amayengo by’eddoboozi bikyuka, kubanga kino kiba ku muntu awulira eddoboozi. Ate era, byombi bikyuka mu ngeri eza kikontana, bwatyo omugatte gw’ebipimo byabyo gusigala nga gwe gumu.
answer_b: Kiki ekireetera enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw’amayengo n’obuwanvu bw’amayengo g’eddoboozi? Waliwo kyonna mu mbeera eno? Embiro z’okusaasaana kw’eddoboozi mu nkola ya Doppler tezikyuka. N’olwekyo, singa obungi bw’amayengo g’eddoboozi bwe twawulira bwongezeka, obuwanvu bw’amayengo gabwo bukendeera.
answer_c: Si kituufu okugamba nti embiro z’okusaasaana zikyuka, kubanga za nkalakkalira. Mu nkola ya Doppler, obuwanvu bw’amayengo bukyuka eri omutunuulizi, naye mu mutindo ogwa kyebaliraanwa ku nkyukakyuka y’omugendo eri omutunuulizi. N’olwekyo, ekitondeko ky’ebipimo byombi kiba kya nkalakkalira.
answer_d: Jjukira ebintu ebireetera omuvuyo gw'eddoboozi okukyuka. Waliwo kyonna mu mbeera eno? Newankubadde eri omulabi omuvuyo n'obuwanvu bw'amayengo biyinza okukyuka, omuvuyo gw'okusaasaana tegukyuka. Kati olwo omuvuyo n'obuwanvu bw'amayengo by'eddoboozi bikyuka bitya?

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu siniya, mu mutwe gw’ekyegayiriro ky’ebintu (Stereochemistry) n’engeri ebintu bwe bifaanana (Isomerism), ateekateeka essomo eririna ekigendererwa kino: “Okutegeera obukulu bw’endaga ya R oba S mu bintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo”. Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gwe gufaanagana n’okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo eri abayizi?
answer_a: Buuza abayizi okufumiitiriza ku makulu g'ebyenfuna agali mu kukola eddagala eririna ebika bya R ne S.
answer_b: Buuza abayizi okunoonyereza ku bintu ebibaawo ku bulamu bw’omuntu ng’akozesa eddagala ebbiri eriri mu ngeri ya enantiomers.
answer_c: Buuza abayizi okugeraageranya obuwangwa bw’ebintu ebirungo obwa R ne S stereoisomer obw’ebintu ebikozesebwa ennyo 5, gamba nga, ibuprofen
answer_d: Baagalire abayizi okukozesa amateeka ga Cahn-Ingold-Prelog okusalawo endagakubbo ya R ne S eya kampawundi 5 ezikozesebwa ennyo, ng'ekyokulabirako, frukitoosi.

question: Omusomesa w’omu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, mu somo ly’ebintu ebisaanuuse, annyonnyola ku bikulukusi ebitasaanuuka bulungi (colloids). Alaga nti mu mutindo gw’ebintu ng’ogwo mulimu obutoffaali obuba butengejja. Ayongera okwolesa obunnyonnyofu ng’alaga ebifaananyi by’ebyokulabirako, gamba nga mayoneesi ne jelatiini. Ku nkomerero y’ekibiina, omuyizi omu agolola omukono gwe n’agamba: “Simanyi lwaki mayoneesi ne jelatiini bikulukusi ebitasaanuuka bulungi (colloids) ate ng’obutoffaali obwo obutengejja tebusobola kulabika. Ku lwange, bintu bisaanuuke bulungi.” Kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukola okusobola okukozesa engeri z’ebintu ebitasaanuuka bulungi (colloid) okuddamu omuyizi oyo ekibuuzo kye?
answer_a: Kozesa omugatte gwa Tyndall mu kintu ekikolebwa nga colloid.
answer_b: Gabulaamu akatono aka mayonnaise n'amazzi era weetegereze ebyo by'olaba.
answer_c: Loboza obutonde bw'akaziba obulabika nga bwe butegekebwamu mu kkoloyidi emanyiddwa.
answer_d: Gerageranya endabika y'obuziba bw'ekikulukusi ekigumu n'ey'ekinyalala.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekisooka mu siniya, mu mutwe gw’eby’Erinnya ly’Ebintu Ebitali Biramu, akulembera essomo nga alina ekigendererwa kino: "Okukozesa enkola ey’entegeka, eya Stock, n’ey’ennono okutuuma erinnya erya metal oxides". Bw’aba annyonnyola engeri y’okutuuma amannya g’ebintu bino ng’akozesa enkola ya Stock, akiraba nti abayizi tebategeera lwaki balina okussaamu omugatte gw’amaanyi ga meto mu nnamba za Kiroma mu mbeera ezimu zokka. Okugonjoola ekizibu kino, omusomesa asalawo okukola omukolo. Ku mikolo gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gw’ekola okugonjoola obuzibu omusomesa bw’azuula mu bayizi be?
answer_a: Omusomesa awandiika ku lubaawo olutalaaga olutendera lw’ebintu ebirimu ekyuma ekikwataganye ne oxygen era n’asaba abayizi okubala omuwendo gw’obuzito bw’ekyuma obwa oxidation mu buli kimu. Oluvannyuma, balowooza ku miwendo gy’obuzito bwa oxidation egy’enjawulo egy’ebyuma ebirabika mu buli kikemeko.
answer_b: Omusomesa awandiika ku lubaawo oluwandiikira ebibuuzo eby'omutendera ku byuma ebirina oxygen era n'asaba abayizi okubituuma amannya, nga bakozesa amateeka g'empandiika ya Stock, oluvannyuma, baddamu ekibuuzo: "Lwaki ebipooli by'ebyuma ebirina oxygen ebyogeddwaako birina amannya ag'enjawulo?"
answer_c: Omusomesa awandiika ku lubaawo fomula ya dayookiso ne kkoppa monookisayidi, abayizi ne baddamu ekibuuzo kino ekibakubiriza okulowooza: "Engeri bbiri zino ze ziriisa zaawulwa mu ndagiriro ya Sitooki bwe kiba nti ayokisayidi eya meto erimu omugatte gwe gumu ogw'ebintu eby'ekikemiko?"
answer_d: Omusomesa awandiika ku lubaawo olukalala lw'ebintu eby'ekyuma nga birina valensi zaabyo era n'asaba abayizi okuwandiika mu buwandiike bwabwe ebika bya ayokisaidi z'ekyuma ebyo bye bisobola okukola, oluvannyuma, baddamu ekibuuzo: "Lwaki ebintu ebimu eby'ekyuma bisobola okwegatta mu bungi obwenjawulo ne okisijeni, ne bikola ebintu eby'ekemiko eby'enjawulo?"

question: Omusomesa omukulu ow’ekibinja eky’okubiri agenda kukolera wamu n’abayizi be ku bintu ebikosa obusobozi bw’ekintu okusaanuuka n’engeri gye bikozesebwaamu. Ekigendererwa kye kwe kukola kino ng’asinziira ku byo omutindo gw’ebyenjigiriza gwe gussa essira ku kumanya ebikwata ku ssaayansi. Mu mbeera eno, mulimu ki, ogugenda okukolebwa abayizi, ogusobola okukwata ku biri mu somo n’okuddamu okussa essira ku byo omutindo gw’ebyenjigiriza gwe gussa ku kumanya ebikwata ku ssaayansi?
answer_a: Banoonyereza ku bintu ebikolebwa okukankanya n’oluvannyuma okuggulawo eccupa ya soda
answer_b: Bakola omulimu gw'okugezesa ku bimera ebimera mu mazzi ku tempulikya ez'enjawulo era ne bagigeraageranya n'amaanyi agakolebwa ekkolero erikozesa obwoki bw'amasannyalaze.
answer_d: Bannyonnyola ebiva mu data okuva mu ggulaafu eraga omuwendo gwa oxyhemoglobin mu musaayi okusinziira ku bunene bw'akanyigirizi k'omukka ogwa oxygen.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya mu mwaka ogw’okuna, bw’aba ateekateeka omutwe gw’ebyokubala ogw’okukoppa asidi ne beesi, ateekawo ekigendererwa kino: “Okukwataganya obungi bw’ekintu n’ennyingo y’ekibalangulo okubala pH mu bika bya asidi ne beesi ennafu ez’enjawulo”. Mu bino ebiri wammanga, kiki omuyizi ky’asaanidde okuba ng’amaze okukitegeera okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Omukwano oguli wakati w'amaanyi g'ekibasira n'ekikwatagana nakyo
answer_b: Okukiikirira okwawukana kw'ebintu ebirimu obusannyalaze
answer_c: Okunnyonnyola omugatte ogw’enkalubo mu kikolwa ekikemiko
answer_d: Okutegeera omuwendo gwa molarity mu bikulukusi bya kemiko ebiyitamu amasannyalaze

question: Ekibiina ky'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'okubiri mu siniya balina okukola omulimu ogugendereddwamu okuyiga kino: "Okulambulula ebirungo by'ebiramu nga bayita mu bibinja byabyo ebikola". Mu biraga by'okukebera ebiddirira, kiruwa ekitalinga ekigendererwa ekyateereddwa era ekitasaanidde kubeera mu mulamwa ogw'okukebera omulimu guno?
answer_a: Okimanyi ebbibina by'emirimu
answer_b: Okutondeka ebirungo mu bibinja okusinziira ku busobozi bwabyo okwegatta n'ebintu ebirala.
answer_c: Londa ebika by’ebizimbamubiri okusinziira ku mutindo gw’obukwanaganya bwabyo (isomerism).
answer_d: Okutondeka ebirungo by'ebiramu eby'enjawulo nga tukozesa amannya ga IUPAC.

question: Omusomesa akola ku mutwe gw'ekyokya n'amaanyi n'ekibiina ky'omunaana. Ku limu ku masomo, ategeka omukolo gw'okugezesa ogulina ekigendererwa ky'abayizi okulaga nti ekyokya ekikwatiddwa kisinziira ku bwangu bw'ekyokya obwa buli kintu. Mu nkola zino ez'okugezesa, engeri ki etuukana n'okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateereddwawo?
answer_a: Bbaatiira amazzi n’ekiro ebyenkana obuzito mu bbiika ez’enjawulo era opime tempulikya esooka ne tempulikya ey’enkomerero oluvannyuma lw’ekiseera ekigereke.
answer_b: Teeka mL 50 z'amazzi agookya ku 90 °C mu bikopo bibiri bye bimu, ekimu kya gilasi n'ekirala kya ffoamu, era opime ebbanga amazzi ge gamala okukkakkana okutuuka ku tempulikya ya 25 °C.
answer_c: Bbugumya amazzi amalongoofu 50 mL n'amazzi ag'omunnyo 50 mL mu bbiika ez'enjawulo era opime ebbanga erimalawo amazzi amalongoofu n'ag'omunnyo okutuuka we gafuumukira.
answer_d: Bbugumya akajiiko k'ekyuma ku muliro ate okateeke mu kikopo ky'amazzi agatonnya mu kasenge era opime ebbugumu ly'amazzi buli sikonda 20 okutuusa nga litereeze.

question: Omusomesa ategeka omulimu gw'ekibiina okukolera awamu n'abayizi be ab'ekibiina kya munaana ku kigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera ebintu ebyesigamiziddwa n'ebitali byesigamiziddwa mu bintu ebikola ku nkola y'omusaayi omukadde". Mulimu ki, oguteereddwa omusomesa, ogukwatagana n'ekigendererwa ky'ekibiina?
answer_a: Gerageranya endabika y'omusuulo mu muntu omulamu n'omuntu alina sukaali.
answer_b: Zimba akataabo akalaga engeri omwenge gye gakyusaamu obungi bw'omusuulo ogufulumizibwa.
answer_c: Kkompleeta tebuleni ewandiika langi y'omusuulo mu biseera bya lunaku eby'enjawulo.
answer_d: Maliriza eggereesa nga olaga omuwendo gw'ebintu eby'enjawulo mu bitundu by'omusuwa gw'ensigo.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka omutwe gw'ebyokuyiga ogw'Empewo Ennungi gw'agenda okusomesa ekibiina eky'omusanvu. Ebigendererwa by'essomo erimu mu mutwe guno bye bino: "Okutegeera omukwano wakati w'ebbugumu n'obungi bw'empewo mu bulamu obwa bulijjo." Okulaga omukwano guno, omusomesa agenda kukozesa eky'okulabirako ekikwatagana n'amateeka g'empewo. Mu mbeera zino wammanga, y'eriwa esinga okuba eky'okulabirako ekirungi okukiikirira ebyo ebinaakubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo mu kibiina?
answer_a: Enkola y'ekyoto ekifumbisa mu bwangu (pressure cooker)
answer_b: Obuwombeevu bw'omugaati obukolebwa n'ekizimbulukusa
answer_c: Okuyingiza n'okufulumya omukka mu mawuggwe.
answer_d: Okukolebwa kw’obusaanikira bw’ebbampuuyi nga gguloopinga eccupa ya soda

question: Mu kibiina kya P8, omusomesa akoze ekigezo ku atomu n’engeri ayoni gye zikolebwamu. Ebivaamu biraga nti omuwendo munene ogw’abayizi balowooza nti okukolebwa kwa keyoni (cations) kuleetebwawo atomu okwongerako oba “okufuna” polotooni (protons). Mulimu ki omusomesa gw’ayinza okuteesa eri abayizi be okubayamba okutegeera obulungi engeri keyoni gye zikolebwamu?
answer_a: Buuza abayizi okutegeera omuwendo gwa puletoni, erikitulooni, ne nyutulooni eziri mu ayoni ez’enjawulo nga basinziira ku namba y’akaziba (Z) n’ennamba y’obuzito (A).
answer_b: Basabye abayizi okukola, awamu n'omusomesa, akatebe akalaga omuwendo gwa puletoni, eretulooni, ne nnyutulooni mu katayoni ne anayoni ez'enjawulo.
answer_c: Saba abayizi okukola ekibalanguwa ekiraga engeri emiramwa gino gye gikwatagana: akaziba, olububi, obusannyalaza, obukontanyo,obutaffaali, ayoni, kayoni, n’ayoni enkyamu
answer_d: Bayizi balambike okugeraageranya engeri atomu ya sodium entaanu gy'efaanana n'engeri sodium bw'efaanana ng'ekyebulukusi, nga balowooza ku muwendo gwa purotoni, elekitulooni, ne nyutulooni eza buli emu.

question: Omusomesa agenda okusomesa ekibinja ky'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu ku nkola y'omubiri ey'okwerinda endwadde. Mu masomo agamu, ateekateeka okusomesa kino: "Okutegeera engeri omutindo ogw'okusatu ogw'obwerinde gye gukolamu." Kintu ki ekikulu abayizi kye bateekwa okusobola okwawulawo nga tebannatandika kusomesebwa kigendererwa ekyateekebwawo eri ekibiinja?
answer_a: Enjawulo wakati w'ekizibiti n'akawuka akireeta
answer_b: Enjawulo wakati w'emirimu gy'obutaffaali bwa B ne T
answer_c: Okukkiriza n'okujjukira kw'omubiri (immunological memory)
answer_d: Okutolokwa okw’amaanyi n’obutonde bw’omubiri okuziyiza endwadde

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibiina eky'omusanvu ateekateeka essomo ku maanyi, ng'alina ekigendererwa eky'okunnyonnyola mu bwangu amaanyi g'omutunziro, oba etteeka lya Hooke. Ebimu ku bintu abayizi bye balina okuba nga baayiga dda, kiki kye balina okuba nga bamaze okuyiga okusobola okutegeera etteeka lino?
answer_a: Okikiikirira obunene, obwolekero, n’engeri y’amaanyi gye gakolamu.
answer_b: Omukwano wakati w'amaanyi g'obuzito n'enkyukakyuka omubiri gye guba nagyo
answer_c: Enjawulo y'amaanyi ag'enkanankana oba agaddawo agabeerawo mu bintu ebimu.
answer_d: Okutegeera engeri amaanyi gye gakosaamu enkula n'entambula y'ebintu.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka ekibuuzo ekiddamu mu buwandiike eky’akamalirizo ku mutendera ogw’omusanvu okusobola okukung’aanya obukakafu ku mutendera gw’omuyigirizwa ogw’ebiruubirirwa by’okuyiga bino: "Okunnyonnyola engeri ggaasi ennungi gye zeeyisaamu mu mbeera eza bulijjo, nga otunuulira amateeka agigoberera." Ku biraga ebiri wammanga, kiruwa ekiraga nti ekiruubirirwa kituukiddwako?
answer_a: Bakozesa amateeka ga Boyle, Gay-Lussac, ne Charles mu ngeri etali ya kubala mu byokulabirako ebya bulijjo.
answer_b: Bannyonnyola ebifa mu ggulaafu, nga bakakasa omukwano wakati w'akanyigirizi n'ebipimo by'obubugumu bw'eggaasi
answer_c: Balaga mu bulamu obwa bulijjo obungi bw’ebipimo by’ebintu eby’omukka omungi n’ebipimo by’obugumu bwabyo.
answer_d: Bakubalira omuwendo gw’obwoki, obungi, n’akanyigirizi k’ekigaz, nga bakozesa omugatte gw’amateeka g’ekigaz ekituufu mu mbeera eza bulijjo.

question: Omusomesa amaze okusomesa ekibinja ky’abaana abali mu mwaka ogw’okutaano ku mutwe gw’amasannyalaze agenda kukola akakeeno; mu bintu ebirala, asuubira okukakasa obutuukirivu bw’akabonero kano wammanga: “Okwaawula ebintu ebiyisa amasannyalaze okuva ku bitabiyisa”. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’akabonero akaakamaze okwogerwako?
answer_a: Saba abayizi okwetegereza ekikolwa ky’amasannyalaze ekiri mu mutendera ogukola n’okugeraageranya n’omulala ogutakola era n’okunnyonnyola lwaki ogwo ogutakola gukola gutyo.
answer_b: Baagalire abayizi okwetegereza akataambi akalaga omuwendo gw'amasannyalaze agatambulira mu byuma ebitali bimu, oluvannyuma babuuze ekibuuzo kino: Kiki ku byuma ebiri ku kataambi ekiyinza okukozesebwa obulungi ng'omuyitiro gw'amasannyalaze mu mutendera gw'amasannyalaze?
answer_c: Lwaki omusajja alina okwambala engalo za laaba ng’akwata ku waya z’amasannyalaze?
answer_d: Laga abayizi ekifaananyi ky'akazinga k'amasannyalaze akataaggwa era obasabe okulonda mu bintu, gamba nga foorka ey'ekyuma, kamuyooyo ow'omu polasitika, n'akakaba ak'omu labba, ekimu oba ebiwerako ebiyinza okuggusa akazinga kalyoke akataala kemere.

question: Omusomesa agenda kukebera akabonero kano mu kibiina eky'omusanvu: "Okutawula ebipimo ebikozesebwa okunnyonnyola ekikankano ky'ettaka". Mulimu ki omuyizi gw'akola ogusobozesa okukung'aanya obukakafu obulaga nti akabonero kano katuukiddwako?
answer_a: Londa we nsindikirizo y’omusisi gyasinziira okusinziira ku biwandiiko okuva mu bifo bisatu ebiwandiika ebikunkumuka by’ensi.
answer_b: Noonyereza ku musisi eyasinga obunene okubaawo mu Chile n'ebizibu ebyagattibwa ku gwo.
answer_c: Londaamu ensobi eziri mu nkozesa y'ebigambo obunene n'amaanyi mu lipooti z'amawulire.
answer_d: Enjawulo wakati w'obubonero bubiri obuddiring'ana ku kipimo kya Richter mu buwero bw'amaanyi agasumululwa.

question: Omusomesa, mu mwaka ogusooka ogw'essomero eya Secondary, mu mutwe gw'eky'obulamu ogw'Enkyukakyuka n'Obungi bw'ebiramu, akola omulimu n'abayizi be mwe balina okugeraageranya amino asidi ez'enjawulo eza puloteni C okuva mu nsolo ez'enjawulo n'okuteebereza enkolagana y'eby'obusika wakati waazo. Mu kiseera ky'okukola omulimu guno, omuyizi abuuza: “Bwe kiba nti ekisukkulumya ebiramu kwe kuba n'amawulire mu DNA yaabyo, mugaso ki ogw'okugeraageranya ennyiriri za amino asidi eza puloteni?”. Nga tutunuulidde omutendera gw'omuyizi, mu nnyonnyola zino omusomesa gy'awa, eyiwa ku kibuzo ky'omuyizi?
answer_a: Ekizimbamubiri kye kimu kisobola okweyoleka mu biramu by’ebika eby’enjawulo. Amawulire agazimba ekizimbamubiri ago galondoolwa mu busirikale bw’obutonde (genes). N’olwekyo, okuyita mu kumanya enjawulo wakati w’obusirikale bw’obutonde obukola ekizimbamubiri n’olukalala lw’ebitundu by’ekizimbamubiri (amino acid sequences), enkolagana z’emyaka gy’obulamu wakati w’ebika bisobola okuteeberezebwa.
answer_b: Puloteni zikolebwa mu nnamba ennungi ey'obucaafu bw'amino acidi ekkodeddwa mu DNA. Bwe wabaawo enkyukakyuka mu kino, kyakukyusa endagiriro y'obucaafu bw'amino acidi obwa puloteni eyo. N'olwekyo, nga tutunuulidde omuwendo gw'obucaafu bw'amino acidi obwenjawulo obwa puloteni y'emu, omuntu ayinza okumanya engeri ebika eby'enjawulo gye bikwatagana mu nkulaakulana.
answer_c: Puloteni zikolebwa okuva mu kunnyonnyolwa kw’obubaka bwa RNA, obuva mu kuwandiika kwa jjiini. Puloteni eno esobola okulagibwa nga waliwo enkyukakyuka mu nkola y’obusirikale bw’amino asidi. N’olwekyo, nga tukozesa okunoonyereza ku nkola zino, enkolagana z’endabika y’ebiramu ez’enjawulo zisobola okuteekebwawo.
answer_d: Enkola y’obusirikale bw’ekikulukuto kya amino mu poloteyini esalibwawo enkola y’obubonero bwa codons obuba ku bubaka bwa RNA obukolebwa. Okuva buli codon lulinga enkola y’obusirikale busatu obwa nucleotides, bwe kikyusibwa, poloteyini erina enkola y’obusirikale bw’ekikulukuto kya amino eyawukana ku ya poloteyini eyasooka eyinza okufunika. N’olwekyo, okumanya omuwendo gw’ebikulukuto bya amino eby’enjawulo wakati w’ebika bibiri, omuntu ayinza okumanya nga bwe bikwatagana mu nkulaakulana.

question: Abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, nga bakulemberwa ebibuuzo by’omusomesa, batunula mu magezi ag’ekibalangulo ag’edda agaawa obukakafu ku kifo eky’ebintu ebiraga obuzaale n’enkolagana yaabyo n’endabika y’ebiramu mu biramu ebirina obuzi bwabyo mu busa. Okuva mu magezi ag’ekibalangulo ag’okukyusa obuzi mu nsaano za Xenopus laevis agaakolebwa John Gurdon, agaawa obukakafu nti obutaffaali bw’omu byenda bulimu obubaka bwonna obw’obuzaale obwetaagisa okukula kw’ekiramu ekikulu, omu ku bayizi abuuza: “Lwaki eggi lyokka eriggyiddwamu obuzi lyekozesebwa mu magezi gano, so si butaffaali bulala bwonna obuggiddwamu obuzi?”. Mu nnyonyola zino omusomesa gy’awa, ennyonyola ki esobola okuddamu ekibuuzo ky’omuyizi mu ngeri entuufu era etegeerekeka?
answer_a: Okusobola okukola ekintu ekiramu ekijjuvu nga tukozesa enkola y’okukyusa obuziizi, akataffaali akaweebwa obuziizi kalina okuba nga tekannakyuka era nga kalimu ebintu ebireetera akataffaali okukyuka mu buziba bwakyo, ebintu ebyo birina okuba nga byawukana n’ebyo ebiri mu buziba bw’akataffaali akaakagabwa.
answer_b: Oosayiti (oocyte) lwe butoffaali obutannakyuka obulina obusobozi okukulaakulana ne buzaala ebika by’obutoffaali ebiwerako, kubanga obutoffaali bwabwo (cytoplasm) bulimu ebintu ebiyamba okwawula ebika by’obutoffaali nga bisunsula ebikolwa by’okuwandiika n’okuvvuunula ebiri mu buziizi obuteereddwamu (transplanted nucleus).
answer_c: Olwekyo ebika by’obutoffaali bw’omubiri obulala, gamba ng’obutoffaali bw’omu byenda, butoffaali bwe bwa njawulo nga cytoplasm yaabwo erimu ebintu eby’enjawulo ebikubiriza okuggyawo obutaffaali obwetaagisa okukula kw’omwana yenna mu lubuto, ekintu ekitabaho mu egg cell.
answer_d: Olw’okuba obutoffaali bw’omu lubuto olw’enkazi, obutafaananako butoffaali bulala obwawuddwamu, gamba nga obutoffaali bw’omu byenda, bulina ebintu byonna ebyetaagisa okwawula ebireeteka akatundu k’obutoffaali akaggyiddwa mu butoffaali obulala okukola, ekisobozesa okukula kw’omwana yenna.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya y’annyonnyola engeri obutaffaali bw’omubiri gye bulwanyisaamu endwadde nga bweyambisa obutaffaali bwa ‘antibodies’, naddala ebika bya ‘antibodies’, omuyizi n’amubuuza: “Kitegeeza ki omuntu okuzuulibwa ng’alina akawuka ka ‘viral’ mu musaayi nga bakozesezza ‘antibody test’ ne basanga alina ‘IgG’ so si ‘IgM’?”. Mu nnyonnyola zino wammanga, nnyonnyola ki esobola okwanukula omuyizi mu ngeri etegeerekeka era entuufu?
answer_a: Kitegeeza nti omuntu atuuse ku ntikko y’ekiseera eky’obulwadde obukambwe, kubanga IgG ne IgM ze antibody ezikola ku buli kika kya virus era ziyimbulwa mu kiseera kino kyokka.
answer_b: Kitegeeza nti omuntu oyo yali mu kitundu ekisembayo eky'ekiseera ekibaawo amangu ek'obulwadde, nga mu kiseera kino obutaffaali bwa plasma obukwatagana n'ekika kya virusi buli omu butandika okukola IgG ne IgM.
answer_c: Kitegeeza nti omuntu ali mu kitundu ekisooka eky’ekiwato ekinene eky’obulwadde, nga mu kitundu kino obutoffaali bwa plasma obw’enjawulo ku buli kika kya vayiraasi butandika okukola IgG ne IgM.
answer_d: Kitegeeza nti omuntu awona, kubanga IgG ne IgM ze ntambalazo ezikola ku buli kika kya akawuka, nga zikolebwa mu kiseera omuntu lw'alumbiddwa obulwadde, okusooka IgM oluvannyuma IgG, nga oluvannyuma IgG esigala mu musaayi okumala ebbanga ddene.

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu S.2, mu kiseera ky’essomo ku DNA n’okukubisaamu obutaffaali, ategeka omulimu gw’okukolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: “Okutegeera engeri ebizimba bya kansa gye bikolebwa”. Bintu ki abayizi bye balina okuba nga bamaze okubimanya okusobola okukola ku kiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Ebiseera by'omutendera gw'obulamu bw'akataffaali
answer_b: Obukulu bw'ekigabanyo ky'obutaffaali ekya mitosis
answer_c: Ebifo omukutu gwe kikula ky'obutaffaali mwe guyita
answer_d: Ebika by'enkyukakyuka mu DNA ne mu chromosome

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina kya siniya ng’amaliriza omutwe gw’omukutu gw’obubonero bw’obusimu agenda kukebera okuyiga okugendereddwa kuno: “Okunnyonnyola engeri omukutu gw’obubonero bw’obusimu gye gukwataganyaamu ebikolwa by’ekiramu okusobola okwetoloola embeera ng’okuyita mu bubonero obuweerezebwa obutaffaali bw’obusimu okwetoloola omubiri gwonna”. Mu bintu bino ebiri wansi, kiki ekiraga nti ekigendererwa ekyo kituukiddwako?
answer_a: Bakebera ebifaananyi eby'enjawulo eby'ebikolwa ebyangu ebya reflekisi era ne basobola okwawula ebitundu byabyo.
answer_b: Bannyonnyola enkyukakyuka ezilabika mu ngeri omubiri gye gwewangamu okusinziira ku maanyi agukubye.
answer_c: Bannyonnyola engeri ebizimba by’obutoffaali bw’obwongo gye bikolebwamu, ekisobozesa okukola ebika by’okuddamu ebitali bimu
answer_d: Banannyonnyola omukulu gw’omugongo, obwongo, ebintu ebiwulira, n’ebikola mu nteekateeka y’okuddamu kw’obubonero bw’obwongo.

question: Omusomesa omutendeke ateekateeka essomo ly'ekibiina eky'okubiri ng'agenda kulambulula ekigendererwa kino: "Okukozesa etteeka ly'obungi bw'amaanyi obutakyuka mu nkola enzigale". Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gumu ku guleka abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Bawa ebyokulabirako by’obutomere obulaga nti obungi bw’amasoboza busigala nga bwe bwali.
answer_b: Bapima obuzito bw'emmotoka n'embiro emmotoka ze zaabadde nazo nga tezinnatomeragana n'embiro ze ziba nazo nga zimaze okutomeragana ku ttuleeki etalina bukakafu bwonna.
answer_c: Bano balaga omukwano wakati w'amaanyi agakozeseddwa, obudde bwe gamazeeko, n'empalirizo omubiri gwe gufuna mu layini emu.
answer_d: Balindiriza ekinavaamu okugong'ana wakati w'ebibiina by'ebiziyiza bibiri ebifanana nga biserebuka awatali kukwatagana.

question: Omusomesa omubisi omwaka ogusooka mu Ssekendulewa ateekateeka essomo n’ekigendererwa kino: “Okukozesa omutindo gw’amayengo okunnyonnyola nti ekitangaala kyeyoleka era ne kimenyeka bwe kikuba ekifo ekyawula ebintu bibiri.” Ng’enkola y’okuyigiriza okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino, omusomesa asalawo okukozesa ebikozesebwa eby’okusomesa ebyanguya okutegeera ebyo ebiri mu somo. Kiki ku bikozesebwa eby’okusomesa wammanga ekikwatagana n’ekigendererwa ky’omusomesa kino?
answer_a: Ekitundu ky’ekitabo ky’essomero ekinnyonnyola enjawulo wakati w’endowooza y’obuntu n’ey’amayengo ku musana, n’obubaka buli emu bwe yawa ku misinde gy’omusana mu kubulukuka.
answer_b: Okutengejja okw’ekikompyuta okulaga mu bujjuvu engeri ebyoya by’omusaayi gw’amazzi gye bikosebwa olw’okukyusa n’okumenyeka kw’ekitangaala nga kikuba ekifo wakati w’ebintu bibiri
answer_c: Okulaga mu kibiina omutangaavu gwa leza nga gukuba amazzi agali mu akuliyamu, we kiyinza okulabirwa nti ekitundu ku mutangaavu guddamu waggulu ate ekitundu ekirala ne kimenyeka ku mpalazo engeri engeri.
answer_d: Omulimu ogukolebwa ku kompyuta ogusobozesa omuyizi okulaba nga omutangaavu bwe gutumizibwa ku kintu ekigabanya ebintu bibiri eby’enjawulo, ekitundu kimu kiguddamu ate ekitundu ekirala ne kiyitamu nga buli kimu kirina engeli yakyo.

question: Mu kibiina ky’omwaka ogw’okubiri mu Ssomero lya wakati, omusomesa annyonnyola abayizi etteeka ly’amaanyi agasikayo ebintu byonna. Okusobola okwoleka obukulu bw’amaanyi gano, alaga abayizi oluyimba lw’ekkompyuta olulaga appo ng’egwa okuva ku muti oba omwezi nga gwekulungulula Ensi. Omusomesa akiraba nti abayizi abamu batabukiddwa, nga tebasobola kukwataganya mbeera zino n’etteeka erinyonnyolwa. Mu byokulabirako bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukozesa okwongera okutegeera kw’abayizi ku nsonga eno, n’okutangaza okutabuka kwabwe?
answer_a: Asinga omugwa ku kapiira n’abalaga nti, okuzunguza akapiira okuva ku nkomerero y’omugwa, kifuna omugendo ogwetoloola. Oluvannyuma,annyonnyola nti amaanyi agasindikiriza ekintu wakati (centripetal force) agava ku muguwa okuba nga gutegeddwa gafaanana ng’amaanyi agasindikiriza ebintu ku nsi (gravity) ku Mwezi.
answer_b: Enyonyoza ekiraga ekifo ng’ekintu ekiwanvu era ekigumu ekyeyambisibwa okutambulira waggulu, omuli ekintu ekipima obuzito kinene, ekikiikirira Ensi, kiyiringisizza ekifo kino, ne kireetera ebintu ebiri okumpi ebipima obuzito obutono okugwa oba okwetoloola ekintu ekisooka mu makubo ag’enjawulo.
answer_c: Akwata ekijjulo ky’omuti gw’emmwanyi ng’asuula akapiira; oluvannyuma, akasuula mu bwangu okulaga nti singa kiba n’embiro ennyingi ku ntandikwa, kigwa wala. Oluvannyuma, akola ekiwandiiko ku lubaawo olulaga engeri ejjulo ly’emmwanyi gye liyinza okutambuliramu, okutuusa lw’etambulira okwetoloola enkula y’ensi.
answer_d: Akolera akabonero ku lubaawo oluddugavu akalaga engeri apple gy’egwa, ng’annyonnyola obuzito bwayo n’obw’Ensi, ob المسافهة wakati w’ebitongole byabyo n’amaanyi agaleeta okukwatagana. Oluvannyuma, alongoosa akabonero okulaga engeri omwezi n’Ensi gye bikwatagana, ng’akyusa ku data eyasooka.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya mu mwaka ogw’omukaaga ategese okukola ku birowoozo bino wammanga mu ssomero ly’amayengo n’amaloboozi: - Obunene bw’eddoboozi (Pitch) - Amaanyi g’eddoboozi (Intensity) - Okukankana (Vibration) - Omugatte gw’amayengo (Frequency) - Ekiseera (Period) - Obuwanvu bw’ejjengo (Wavelength) - Okwetoloola (Reflection) - Okutomebwa (Absorption) - Amaanyi (Energy) - Okutabanguka (Interference) - Embiro z’okusaasaana (Speed of propagation) - Obutabaamu mpewo (Vacuum)  Birowoozo ki bibiri omusomesa by’alina okusooka okukolako okusobola okukulaakulanya okuyiga ebiri ku lukalala oluwanvu waggulu?
answer_a: Omuyaga n'amasoboza
answer_b: Omugatte gw'emirundi n'obuwanvu bw'amayengo
answer_c: Okunkunuka n'omuwendo gw'okukunukirira
answer_d: Amagezi n'obuwanvu bw'omuyengo

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya ateekateeka okukola akakube ak’okukebera okumanya oba abayizi bategeera ebyo by’ayigirizza ku nkomerero y’essomo erikwata ku bintu ebivaamu amaloboozi. Ku bino ebikwata ku ngeri omuyizi gy’akolaamu, kiraga nti amanyi ebireetawo embeera ya Doppler ki?
answer_a: Bikulembera mu kifaananyi biraga engeri ennyingo z'amayengo gye zinyigirizibwa oba okwawukanyizibwa olw'emisinde gy'ekintu ekiyingiza amayengo.
answer_b: Banoonyeza omuspeedi gw'ekintu ekireeta eddoboozi n'omuwendo gw'eddoboozi lyekireeta okusobola okuteebereza omuwendo gw'eddoboozi omuntu gw'anaawulira.
answer_c: Bannyonnyola engeri emisinde egy'enjawulo wakati w'akakungaanya n'omuwerekereza gye gikyusa omugatte gw'omuwerekereza omutendera gw'amayengo we gutuukira.
answer_d: Bano balambulula embeera omulambuzi mw’alaba enjawulo mu bungi bw’amayengo olw’omuvuduko gw’agenda nagwo okusemberera oba okwewala ekintu ekiweereza amayengo.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya, mu mutwe gw'eky'ebintu eby'ekikemiko ebibaawo mu mbeera y'obutonde n'engeri gye bikosa, ateekateeka okukebera okwaakamalirizo akatundu akakwata ku mbeera z'okukyusa ebintu nga bikozesa okwongeza oba okukendeeza obungi bwa oxygen. Okukola kino, ekigendererwa kino kiteereddwawo: "Okutegeera ebikolwa eby'okukyusa ebintu nga bikozesa okwongeza oba okukendeeza obungi bwa oxygen mu bulamu obwa bulijjo n'engeri gye bikosaamu abantu b'omulembe guno". Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisobozesa okukungaanya obujulizi obulaga nti ekigendererwa ekyateereddwawo kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Dwandiika omulambululo ng'okozesa ebyo by'oyize, ku ngeri enkuba ey'asidi gy'eyonoonera ebintu eby'ekyuma.
answer_b: Baliraanira, nga mukozesa mbalanguza, embeera z’obuzito bw’ebintu ebirimu mu kikolwa eky’ekimyuka ekya alcolest.
answer_c: Kutereeza, nga tukozesa enkola ya electron-ion, ekibalangulo ky’ekikemiko ekiraga okwoksisayizibwa kw’emiyuwa gy’ekikomo egikozesebwa okuyisa amazzi ag’okunywa nga gikozesa molekyo ya oxygen.
answer_d: Okuteebereza, nga oyita mu nkola ya kyusa ky'embeera y'obuziba, omuwendo gw'obusannyalaza obuyitawo mu kikolwa kya kemiko wakati w'ebintu ebikola batuli erimu akazimbulukusa.

question: Omulimu gw'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'okubiri gwe gumu ku mirimu gyebakolako kwe "Kutegeka n'okunnyonnyola ebikwaata ku physicochemical properties z'ebintu ebirina obutonde bw'obutonde." Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gwe guleka omuntu okukebereza ekigendererwa ekyo waggulu?
answer_a: Bawe abayizi data ku tempulikya ebyokulukusi bya haidrokaboni ez’obuwanvu bw’enziring’anya obw’enjawulo era obasabe okukekkereza oba ziri mu mbeera ya kalimagezi, amazzi oba ggaasi ku tempulikya y’omu kisenge.
answer_b: Baliriza abayizi okunoonyereza ku bubonero bw’okubulukuka kw’ebinywamaji bya kaboni eby’obuwanvu obwenjawulo, babitegeke mu mmeeza, era balambulule oba biri mu mbeera ya kikalu, kikulukusi, oba ggaasi ku tempulikya eya bulijjo.
answer_c: Weebale abayizi data ku tempulikya ebyokirokaboni ze zibulira ku buwanvu bw'enziringanya ez'enjawulo ezitegekeddwa mu tebuleni era obasabe okunnyonnyola empisa okusinziira ku mikwanaganyo egireeteddwa molekyuulu.
answer_d: Weebale abayizi data ku tempulikya ebyokola bwa haidrokaboni ez’obuwanvu bw’enziring’anya obw’enjawulo, ze balina okutegeka mu tebuleni okusinziira ku muwendo gwa kaboni mu nziring’anya oluvannyuma bannyonnyole engeri eno gy’ekolamu okusinziira ku bunene bw’enkolagana molekyu ze ziraga.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekyasooka mu siniya yakola ekigezo okukakasa oba abayizi basobola okutegeera enkola z’ekemiko mu bintu ebibeerawo okubetooloola. Okwongerezaako, agenda kukebera obukulu obw’eby’okusoma obukwata ku kumanya okukwata ku ssaayansi. Okukola kino, yasabye abayizi be okukiikirira ebikolwa by’ekemiko ebikolebwa okubetooloola mu bibinja. Ku nkomerero y’omulimu, ekimu ku bibinja kireeta ebikolwa bino wammanga: ekikolwa kya sodium hydroxide ne hydrochloric acid, okukolebwa kwa hydrochloric acid okuva mu hydrogen ne chlorine, n’okukolebwa kwa carbon dioxide okuva mu carbon ne oxygen. Ku bino ebirowoozo bino wammanga ebirowoozo by’omusomesa ki ebiyinza okuluŋŋamya abayizi okutuuka ku by’okuyiga ebipimiddwa?
answer_a: Bintu ki ebiri enkwatagana n'enkola z'ekimyuka ze wateesezza?
answer_b: Bintu ki ebya bulijjo ebiyinza okukiikirirwa engereso z’ekikemiko?
answer_c: Bintu ki ebireetawo ebintu ebya bulijjo ebikolebwa ebikukuumulukuta?
answer_d: Kiri ku kika ky’ebikolwa bye waleese ekisobola okusangibwa mu bikolwa bya bulijjo?

question: Kintu ki abayizi kye balina okuba nga bamaze okukakasa okusobola okutegeera emisingi gy'ekibalangulo kya Bernoulli?
answer_a: Okukozesa omusingi gwa Pascal
answer_b: Okukozesa omusingi ogw'okukuuma amasoboza
answer_c: Okukozesa omugereeso gw'obutasalako mu bikulukusi ebitengejja
answer_d: Okukozesa emikwanaganyo gya kinemaatika mu bintu ebikulukusi ebitali nnyigirizika
